source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002780_ERENVILLE<tab>Then I will do your bidding. For now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002780_ERENVILLE<tab>Then I will do your bidding. For now.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002790_ERENVILLE<tab>But unless you wish the gleaners to rise up in protest, I advise you to offer tangible improvements for our working conditions. Your promised revelation does nothing to address present circumstances.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002790_ERENVILLE<tab>But unless you wish the gleaners to rise up in protest, I advise you to offer tangible improvements for our working conditions. Your promised revelation does nothing to address present circumstances.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002800_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR<tab>A fair point. Your concerns will be conveyed to the Forum.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002800_REQUESTEDLEGISLATOR<tab>A fair point. Your concerns will be conveyed to the Forum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002810_ERENVILLE<tab>I hope that was informative. You may consider my debt to you repaid in full.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002810_ERENVILLE<tab>I hope that was informative. You may consider my debt to you repaid in full.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002820_ERENVILLE<tab>While I do have my reservations about the Forum, I want to believe that they have our best interests at heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002820_ERENVILLE<tab>While I do have my reservations about the Forum, I want to believe that they have our best interests at heart.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002830_ERENVILLE<tab>Which is why I'm reassured that you're busy sniffing out the truth of things. We can ill afford to place all our eggs in one basket─this master plan of theirs─without first understanding the risks involved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002830_ERENVILLE<tab>Which is why I'm reassured that you're busy sniffing out the truth of things. We can ill afford to place all our eggs in one basket─this master plan of theirs─without first understanding the risks involved.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002840_ALISAIE<tab>Wait, how did you know it was us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002840_ALISAIE<tab>Wait, how did you know it was us?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002850_ERENVILLE<tab>If you mean to impersonate a toad, try studying the real thing. And don't try to fool an expert.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002850_ERENVILLE<tab>If you mean to impersonate a toad, try studying the real thing. And don't try to fool an expert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002860_KRILE<tab>For you. The spell will keep it from wilting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002860_KRILE<tab>For you. The spell will keep it from wilting.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002870_KRILE<tab>She said you would need it for the journey ahead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002870_KRILE<tab>She said you would need it for the journey ahead.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002880_KRILE<tab>Will you speak with Her now? I cannot hope to match Minfilia's clarity, of course, but...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002880_KRILE<tab>Will you speak with Her now? I cannot hope to match Minfilia's clarity, of course, but...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002890_KRILE<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)...Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002890_KRILE<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)...Thank you.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002900_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)...Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002900_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)...Thank you.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002910_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Do not worry. She has lent me her body for only a moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002910_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Do not worry. She has lent me her body for only a moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002920_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Just as I could not save the First from the Flood of Light, it has become arduous for me to interact with the physical world without assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002920_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Just as I could not save the First from the Flood of Light, it has become arduous for me to interact with the physical world without assistance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002930_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Though I might converse with you for a time, the incorporeal form I assumed on the ship would be incapable of casting even the simplest enchantment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002930_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Though I might converse with you for a time, the incorporeal form I assumed on the ship would be incapable of casting even the simplest enchantment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002940_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)It is in the depths of the aetherial sea─the place to which all life returns─where my influence is greatest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002940_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)It is in the depths of the aetherial sea─the place to which all life returns─where my influence is greatest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002950_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)After Minfilia's sacrifice on the First, it was to the sea, here in the Source, where I ferried her soul. I wished that gentle spirit to find rest in the world she loved so well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002950_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)After Minfilia's sacrifice on the First, it was to the sea, here in the Source, where I ferried her soul. I wished that gentle spirit to find rest in the world she loved so well.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002960_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Her...and another who may yet have a part to play. Though that will depend on you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002960_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Her...and another who may yet have a part to play. Though that will depend on you.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002970_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Take the flower. Walk free. For you are free─to go where you wish. To believe what you will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002970_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Take the flower. Walk free. For you are free─to go where you wish. To believe what you will.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002980_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)That bloom will be your guide. Test and proof of your conviction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002980_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)That bloom will be your guide. Test and proof of your conviction.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002990_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)In darkness seek joy. Surrender not to sadness, and see beyond despair. Walk free, and bear the light for others to follow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_002990_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)In darkness seek joy. Surrender not to sadness, and see beyond despair. Walk free, and bear the light for others to follow.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003000_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Together, raise it aloft and let it shine. Till the end, blinding and radiant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003000_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Together, raise it aloft and let it shine. Till the end, blinding and radiant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003010_KRILE<tab>That was...all too brief. Already She seems so far away...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003010_KRILE<tab>That was...all too brief. Already She seems so far away...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003020_KRILE<tab>My apologies if I startled you. Ever since we began our descent into Labyrinthos, I had sensed another's will, straining to reach out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003020_KRILE<tab>My apologies if I startled you. Ever since we began our descent into Labyrinthos, I had sensed another's will, straining to reach out.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003030_KRILE<tab>Even with my particular talents, though, I was unable to make a connection at first. So weak and tenuous it was...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003030_KRILE<tab>Even with my particular talents, though, I was unable to make a connection at first. So weak and tenuous it was...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003040_KRILE<tab>Once I took hold of that wispy thread, imagine my surprise to discover it was Hydaelyn Herself! Needless to say, it seemed wise to learn what we could before letting go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003040_KRILE<tab>Once I took hold of that wispy thread, imagine my surprise to discover it was Hydaelyn Herself! Needless to say, it seemed wise to learn what we could before letting go.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003050_KRILE<tab>Her answers were more cryptic than I would have liked... But at least She left us with a guide of sorts─that unusual flower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003050_KRILE<tab>Her answers were more cryptic than I would have liked... But at least She left us with a guide of sorts─that unusual flower.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003060_KRILE<tab>Yes, we are definitely making progress!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003060_KRILE<tab>Yes, we are definitely making progress!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003070_ALISAIE<tab>You can't be serious! We've done nothing wrong!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003070_ALISAIE<tab>You can't be serious! We've done nothing wrong!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003080_KRILE<tab>Master Fourchenault!? What business has the Forum with us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003080_KRILE<tab>Master Fourchenault!? What business has the Forum with us?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>Obstruction and suppression, apparently.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>Obstruction and suppression, apparently.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003100_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Mistress Baldesion. Our records show you facilitated the Scions' entrance into Sharlayan by claiming them as assistants for your organization.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003100_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Mistress Baldesion. Our records show you facilitated the Scions' entrance into Sharlayan by claiming them as assistants for your organization.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003110_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We are aware of your “investigations.” After alerting the major institutions to the presence of potential troublemakers, we received word from an Archeion custodian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003110_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We are aware of your “investigations.” After alerting the major institutions to the presence of potential troublemakers, we received word from an Archeion custodian.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003120_FOURCHENAULT<tab>A group operating under the auspices of the Students skulking about Labyrinthos and engaging in clandestine behavior.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003120_FOURCHENAULT<tab>A group operating under the auspices of the Students skulking about Labyrinthos and engaging in clandestine behavior.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003130_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Clandestine”? We may not have entered Sharlayan as Scions, but we did naught to conceal our identities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003130_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Clandestine”? We may not have entered Sharlayan as Scions, but we did naught to conceal our identities.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our only purpose in this city is to seek the truth. I can think of no reason why our actions should warrant the Forum's intervention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our only purpose in this city is to seek the truth. I can think of no reason why our actions should warrant the Forum's intervention.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003150_FOURCHENAULT<tab>'Tis not our way to discourage the pursuit of knowledge. But the timing of such pursuits must be considered, not to mention their potential impact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003150_FOURCHENAULT<tab>'Tis not our way to discourage the pursuit of knowledge. But the timing of such pursuits must be considered, not to mention their potential impact.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003160_FOURCHENAULT<tab>With the world in chaos, we, the true caretakers of wisdom, have committed ourselves to an undertaking that demands the utmost discretion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003160_FOURCHENAULT<tab>With the world in chaos, we, the true caretakers of wisdom, have committed ourselves to an undertaking that demands the utmost discretion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003170_FOURCHENAULT<tab>And we will not risk its success by turning a blind eye to disruptive foreign elements in our midst.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003170_FOURCHENAULT<tab>And we will not risk its success by turning a blind eye to disruptive foreign elements in our midst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>What, then, is to be our fate? Will you put us on a ship back to Eorzea?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>What, then, is to be our fate? Will you put us on a ship back to Eorzea?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003190_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The Forum will convene to examine your case. The results of said inquiry will determine your future in this city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003190_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The Forum will convene to examine your case. The results of said inquiry will determine your future in this city.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003200_FOURCHENAULT<tab>As for your absent companion, he has already been detained.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003200_FOURCHENAULT<tab>As for your absent companion, he has already been detained.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003210_ALISAIE<tab>G'raha!? But why? Is reading a crime now, too!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003210_ALISAIE<tab>G'raha!? But why? Is reading a crime now, too!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003220_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Reading is encouraged. Celebrated, even. Not, however, of the volumes shelved in the restricted section of the library.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003220_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Reading is encouraged. Celebrated, even. Not, however, of the volumes shelved in the restricted section of the library.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003230_YSHTOLA<tab>Refusing to comply will only make matters worse. Let us instead treat this as an opportunity to open a dialogue with the Forum.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003230_YSHTOLA<tab>Refusing to comply will only make matters worse. Let us instead treat this as an opportunity to open a dialogue with the Forum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003240_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Silence is often one's best defense. I would advise against prolonging the proceedings with frivolous discourse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003240_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Silence is often one's best defense. I would advise against prolonging the proceedings with frivolous discourse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003250_FOURCHENAULT<tab>But enough─this is not the place for debate. The Rostra awaits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003250_FOURCHENAULT<tab>But enough─this is not the place for debate. The Rostra awaits.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003260_GRAHATIA<tab>Forgive me. I was careless...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003260_GRAHATIA<tab>Forgive me. I was careless...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003270_YSHTOLA<tab>We would have been detained regardless. This way, at least, we manage to stay together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003270_YSHTOLA<tab>We would have been detained regardless. This way, at least, we manage to stay together.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>I trust your time within the forbidden archives was well spent?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>I trust your time within the forbidden archives was well spent?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003290_BARNIER<tab>The Forum will come to order!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003290_BARNIER<tab>The Forum will come to order!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003300_BARNIER<tab>This inquiry is now in session. As Speaker Elect, I will be presiding over the day's proceedings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003300_BARNIER<tab>This inquiry is now in session. As Speaker Elect, I will be presiding over the day's proceedings.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003310_BARNIER<tab>Master Fourchenault. Would you be so kind as to restate the matter which compelled you to summon your colleagues with such urgency?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003310_BARNIER<tab>Master Fourchenault. Would you be so kind as to restate the matter which compelled you to summon your colleagues with such urgency?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003320_FOURCHENAULT<tab>As you are all aware, we recently denied Eorzea's request for Sharlayan assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003320_FOURCHENAULT<tab>As you are all aware, we recently denied Eorzea's request for Sharlayan assistance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003330_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Since then, certain individuals dissatisfied with our decision have taken it upon themselves to interfere with our work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003330_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Since then, certain individuals dissatisfied with our decision have taken it upon themselves to interfere with our work.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003340_FOURCHENAULT<tab>They entered our nation masquerading as associates of the Students of Baldesion, but these malcontents are better known as the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003340_FOURCHENAULT<tab>They entered our nation masquerading as associates of the Students of Baldesion, but these malcontents are better known as the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003350_FOURCHENAULT<tab>These militants wield influence with both the Eorzean and Eastern alliances, and are inextricably involved with the crises presently afflicting the world at large.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003350_FOURCHENAULT<tab>These militants wield influence with both the Eorzean and Eastern alliances, and are inextricably involved with the crises presently afflicting the world at large.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003360_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Loose in our city, these warmongers sought to meddle with and expose matters of state secret. What are they if not a dire threat to be expelled!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003360_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Loose in our city, these warmongers sought to meddle with and expose matters of state secret. What are they if not a dire threat to be expelled!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003370_LEGISLATORA<tab>You have tarnished the good name of the Students. Galuf would be ashamed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003370_LEGISLATORA<tab>You have tarnished the good name of the Students. Galuf would be ashamed...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003380_KRILE<tab>Galuf Baldesion was never one to forsake his fellow man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003380_KRILE<tab>Galuf Baldesion was never one to forsake his fellow man.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003390_KRILE<tab>Even if this nation closed every door and retreated from the world, he would have found a way to help the Scions─help every soul of this star─fight back against the coming doom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003390_KRILE<tab>Even if this nation closed every door and retreated from the world, he would have found a way to help the Scions─help every soul of this star─fight back against the coming doom.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>A terrible enemy stands poised to lay waste to all we hold dear. In the face of such madness, Eorzea reached out to Sharlayan, a respected ally, in the hopes of forming a united front.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>A terrible enemy stands poised to lay waste to all we hold dear. In the face of such madness, Eorzea reached out to Sharlayan, a respected ally, in the hopes of forming a united front.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Was your curt dismissal truly the best you could offer?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Was your curt dismissal truly the best you could offer?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003420_YSHTOLA<tab> Or are you so preoccupied with your “momentous duty of an age long past” that even the end of the world is unworthy of your attention?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003420_YSHTOLA<tab> Or are you so preoccupied with your “momentous duty of an age long past” that even the end of the world is unworthy of your attention?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003430_GRAHATIA<tab>Whence came this revelation?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003430_GRAHATIA<tab>Whence came this revelation?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>From the mouth of a Forum member within fortuitous earshot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>From the mouth of a Forum member within fortuitous earshot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>From the mouth of a Forum member within fortuitous earshot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>From the mouth of a Forum member within fortuitous earshot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003460_GRAHATIA<tab>Then it seems your findings support my own...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003460_GRAHATIA<tab>Then it seems your findings support my own...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>The reason I visited the restricted shelves was to study records of the Forum's policy-making process. To better understand the historical trends underlying their most major decisions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>The reason I visited the restricted shelves was to study records of the Forum's policy-making process. To better understand the historical trends underlying their most major decisions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>At first glance, the positions of neutrality in war and the accumulation of knowledge above all else appear constant and consistent─the unchanging pillars of Sharlayan society.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>At first glance, the positions of neutrality in war and the accumulation of knowledge above all else appear constant and consistent─the unchanging pillars of Sharlayan society.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>And once upon a time, I might have left it at that. These days, however, I am more attuned to the subtleties of governance, and so I noticed something...odd.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>And once upon a time, I might have left it at that. These days, however, I am more attuned to the subtleties of governance, and so I noticed something...odd.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>From a particular point in time, the purpose of these policies shifted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>From a particular point in time, the purpose of these policies shifted.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>No longer was knowledge preserved for the benefit of society. Rather, society was to be gradually reshaped to ensure the preservation of knowledge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>No longer was knowledge preserved for the benefit of society. Rather, society was to be gradually reshaped to ensure the preservation of knowledge.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>The most conspicuous and telling change was the one which befell Labyrinthos. Once little more than an oversized storehouse, an enormous allocation of funds saw it transformed into an advanced research and archival facility.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>The most conspicuous and telling change was the one which befell Labyrinthos. Once little more than an oversized storehouse, an enormous allocation of funds saw it transformed into an advanced research and archival facility.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>I also discovered a fascinating account on the finances of our Dravanian colony.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>I also discovered a fascinating account on the finances of our Dravanian colony.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>The settlement attracted students from far and wide, and the connections and tuition fees thus acquired were funneled into further improvements for the archives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>The settlement attracted students from far and wide, and the connections and tuition fees thus acquired were funneled into further improvements for the archives.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>Now, there is no question that our nation's progress is tied to the acquisition of wisdom. Nevertheless, the vast resources diverted for this purpose borders on the obscene.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>Now, there is no question that our nation's progress is tied to the acquisition of wisdom. Nevertheless, the vast resources diverted for this purpose borders on the obscene.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003560_GRAHATIA<tab>But returning to the matter of when─our change in course appears to have been made some two hundred and seventy years ago...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003560_GRAHATIA<tab>But returning to the matter of when─our change in course appears to have been made some two hundred and seventy years ago...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>The very same period when Sharlayan scholars in the hinterlands began a formal study of the aetherial sea!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>The very same period when Sharlayan scholars in the hinterlands began a formal study of the aetherial sea!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>You found something, did you not? And whatever it was gave rise to your oh-so-important duty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>You found something, did you not? And whatever it was gave rise to your oh-so-important duty...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003590_LEGISLATORB<tab>Mind your tongue, Archon! If you had seen─!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003590_LEGISLATORB<tab>Mind your tongue, Archon! If you had seen─!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003600_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Yes, we are bound by a duty we cannot ignore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003600_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Yes, we are bound by a duty we cannot ignore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003610_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Knowing this, what would you have us do? Abandon our vital work, and join you on the field of battle?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003610_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Knowing this, what would you have us do? Abandon our vital work, and join you on the field of battle?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003620_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We will never choose the way of the sword. We will fulfill our mission not through strife and bloodshed, but survival.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003620_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We will never choose the way of the sword. We will fulfill our mission not through strife and bloodshed, but survival.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003630_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Come what may, we shall live on. We must.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003630_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Come what may, we shall live on. We must.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>Do as you must then. But we Scions will fight─until the heavens fall, until our last breath.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>Do as you must then. But we Scions will fight─until the heavens fall, until our last breath.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003650_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Such misguided zeal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003650_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Such misguided zeal...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Father, I... Master Fourchenault.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Father, I... Master Fourchenault.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003670_ALPHINAUD<tab>I fail to understand the stance you have elected to take. But by the same token, I have yet to find a compelling argument to counter the challenge you put to us in Gridania.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003670_ALPHINAUD<tab>I fail to understand the stance you have elected to take. But by the same token, I have yet to find a compelling argument to counter the challenge you put to us in Gridania.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Still, in the midst of my uncertainty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Still, in the midst of my uncertainty...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003690_ALPHINAUD<tab>I must trust in myself to do what is right. As others have chosen to trust in me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003690_ALPHINAUD<tab>I must trust in myself to do what is right. As others have chosen to trust in me.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003700_ALPHINAUD<tab>So I will continue as I always have, weighing the consequences of my every action, and allowing my hope for the future to inform my decisions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003700_ALPHINAUD<tab>So I will continue as I always have, weighing the consequences of my every action, and allowing my hope for the future to inform my decisions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003710_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>That's quite enough! Have you all forgotten the reason for this assembly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003710_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>That's quite enough! Have you all forgotten the reason for this assembly?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003720_ALISAIE<tab>Scholarch Montichaigne. He's the head of the Studium, and an old friend of my grandfather's.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003720_ALISAIE<tab>Scholarch Montichaigne. He's the head of the Studium, and an old friend of my grandfather's.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003730_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Honestly, every discussion devolves into some interminable debate. Terrible habit. Let's return to the topic at hand, hm?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003730_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Honestly, every discussion devolves into some interminable debate. Terrible habit. Let's return to the topic at hand, hm?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003740_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>By their own admission, these Scions have resolved to fight alongside the Eorzean nations against the doom which swift approaches.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003740_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>By their own admission, these Scions have resolved to fight alongside the Eorzean nations against the doom which swift approaches.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003750_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>But there exists no evidence of an attempt to incite our citizens to do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003750_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>But there exists no evidence of an attempt to incite our citizens to do the same.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003760_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Furthermore, while our decision may well've been the correct one, we cannot simply bull our way through these disagreements without inviting doubts or objections.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003760_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Furthermore, while our decision may well've been the correct one, we cannot simply bull our way through these disagreements without inviting doubts or objections.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003770_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Put yourselves in their place! Who among you would leave a tome unopened if an elder forbid you read it with no reason given?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003770_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>Put yourselves in their place! Who among you would leave a tome unopened if an elder forbid you read it with no reason given?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003780_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>No, if we're to quell further discontent, then we must conclude this matter with a fair and even hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003780_MONTICHAIGNE<tab>No, if we're to quell further discontent, then we must conclude this matter with a fair and even hand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003790_BARNIER<tab>Order! We will have order!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003790_BARNIER<tab>Order! We will have order!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003800_BARNIER<tab>Master Montichaigne raises some valid points. Keeping such concerns in mind, I propose we enforce the following measures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003800_BARNIER<tab>Master Montichaigne raises some valid points. Keeping such concerns in mind, I propose we enforce the following measures.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003810_BARNIER<tab>Until further notice, the Students of Baldesion are to cease any and all activities within the domain of Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003810_BARNIER<tab>Until further notice, the Students of Baldesion are to cease any and all activities within the domain of Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003820_BARNIER<tab>You will also refrain from any further investigation into the Forum's decisions and duties. Failure to comply with these restrictions will result in the immediate expulsion of your Scion associates.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003820_BARNIER<tab>You will also refrain from any further investigation into the Forum's decisions and duties. Failure to comply with these restrictions will result in the immediate expulsion of your Scion associates.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003830_BARNIER<tab>Let us put this judgment to a vote. All in favor, raise your hand!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003830_BARNIER<tab>Let us put this judgment to a vote. All in favor, raise your hand!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003840_BARNIER<tab>I count fifty-one for, and forty-eight against. The proposal is passed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003840_BARNIER<tab>I count fifty-one for, and forty-eight against. The proposal is passed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003850_BARNIER<tab>Students, Scions, you have heard the Forum's judgment. Pray abide by it or face the consequences.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003850_BARNIER<tab>Students, Scions, you have heard the Forum's judgment. Pray abide by it or face the consequences.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003860_BARNIER<tab>Honored members, I thank you for your time. This inquiry is concluded!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003860_BARNIER<tab>Honored members, I thank you for your time. This inquiry is concluded!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003870_EMPLOYEEMAN<tab>Welcome home, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003870_EMPLOYEEMAN<tab>Welcome home, my lady.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003880_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>Welcome home, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003880_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>Welcome home, my lady.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003890_ALISAIE<tab>What? What are you gawping at?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003890_ALISAIE<tab>What? What are you gawping at?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>House Leveilleur in all its grandeur!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>House Leveilleur in all its grandeur!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Scion headquarters must seem squalid indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Scion headquarters must seem squalid indeed...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Just admiring the craftsmanship.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Just admiring the craftsmanship.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003900_ALISAIE<tab>Oh gods, please don't! It makes me feel like a spoiled princess.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003900_ALISAIE<tab>Oh gods, please don't! It makes me feel like a spoiled princess.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003910_ALISAIE<tab>I'll have you know I'm quite fond of the Rising Stones!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003910_ALISAIE<tab>I'll have you know I'm quite fond of the Rising Stones!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003920_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, I...I suppose I never gave the décor much thought. I'm glad that you approve. I think.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003920_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, I...I suppose I never gave the décor much thought. I'm glad that you approve. I think.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003930_AMELIANCE<tab>Lord Fourchenault is not to hear of this visit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003930_AMELIANCE<tab>Lord Fourchenault is not to hear of this visit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003940_AMELIANCE<tab>And I should also like the children to have their gifts ere my husband makes his return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003940_AMELIANCE<tab>And I should also like the children to have their gifts ere my husband makes his return.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003950_EMPLOYEEMAN<tab>As you wish, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003950_EMPLOYEEMAN<tab>As you wish, my lady.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003960_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>Master Alphinaud, Mistress Alisaie, if you would accompany me upstairs...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003960_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>Master Alphinaud, Mistress Alisaie, if you would accompany me upstairs...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003970_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shan't be long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003970_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shan't be long.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003980_AMELIANCE<tab>The twins have been sending letters home from time to time, recounting their latest adventures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003980_AMELIANCE<tab>The twins have been sending letters home from time to time, recounting their latest adventures.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003990_AMELIANCE<tab>I am sure they withhold certain details, of course. If only to keep me from worrying...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_003990_AMELIANCE<tab>I am sure they withhold certain details, of course. If only to keep me from worrying...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004000_AMELIANCE<tab>Yet a mother worries all the same. In the early days especially, I tried to support them as best I could, sending the Scions coin and other such donations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004000_AMELIANCE<tab>Yet a mother worries all the same. In the early days especially, I tried to support them as best I could, sending the Scions coin and other such donations.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004010_AMELIANCE<tab>Fortunately, they have found the strength to overcome adversity time and time again. Their words grow more confident with every letter, their depictions more vivid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004010_AMELIANCE<tab>Fortunately, they have found the strength to overcome adversity time and time again. Their words grow more confident with every letter, their depictions more vivid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004020_AMELIANCE<tab>The triumphs and defeats. The joys and sorrows. 'Tis clear that they have come to find value in every experience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004020_AMELIANCE<tab>The triumphs and defeats. The joys and sorrows. 'Tis clear that they have come to find value in every experience.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004030_AMELIANCE<tab>But of those they treasure most, it would seem that meeting you might be the most impactful. Why, since that fateful day, I do believe there has not been a single missive in which you were not mentioned by name!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004030_AMELIANCE<tab>But of those they treasure most, it would seem that meeting you might be the most impactful. Why, since that fateful day, I do believe there has not been a single missive in which you were not mentioned by name!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004040_AMELIANCE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004040_AMELIANCE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004050_AMELIANCE<tab>'Tis plain they care for you. And I am glad they have such a steadfast companion watching over them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004050_AMELIANCE<tab>'Tis plain they care for you. And I am glad they have such a steadfast companion watching over them.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004060_AMELIANCE<tab>Under normal circumstances I would offer you tea, but alas, these are anything but. In any event, why don't you keep me company whilst we await my children's return? Perhaps you might regale me with a tale or two of your exploits?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004060_AMELIANCE<tab>Under normal circumstances I would offer you tea, but alas, these are anything but. In any event, why don't you keep me company whilst we await my children's return? Perhaps you might regale me with a tale or two of your exploits?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004070_ALISAIE<tab>When you mentioned gifts, I wasn't sure what to expect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004070_ALISAIE<tab>When you mentioned gifts, I wasn't sure what to expect.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004080_ALISAIE<tab>Mother, I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004080_ALISAIE<tab>Mother, I...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004090_AMELIANCE<tab>Oh, look how well it fits you! And the style is to your liking?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004090_AMELIANCE<tab>Oh, look how well it fits you! And the style is to your liking?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004100_ALISAIE<tab>It's perfect─exactly what I would have chosen! But please, tell me you had something different made for Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004100_ALISAIE<tab>It's perfect─exactly what I would have chosen! But please, tell me you had something different made for Alphinaud...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004110_AMELIANCE<tab>Naturally! You are hardly little children anymore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004110_AMELIANCE<tab>Naturally! You are hardly little children anymore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004120_AMELIANCE<tab>And while I shall miss dressing you in those precious matching outfits, I must respect the individuals you have grown to become.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004120_AMELIANCE<tab>And while I shall miss dressing you in those precious matching outfits, I must respect the individuals you have grown to become.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004130_AMELIANCE<tab>See for yourself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004130_AMELIANCE<tab>See for yourself!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you for the splendid clothes, Mother. Stylish, comfortable, and eminently practical!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you for the splendid clothes, Mother. Stylish, comfortable, and eminently practical!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004150_AMELIANCE<tab>I am so glad you like them. They are, however, missing one final touch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004150_AMELIANCE<tab>I am so glad you like them. They are, however, missing one final touch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004160_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>If you would allow me, Master Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004160_EMPLOYEEWOMAN<tab>If you would allow me, Master Alphinaud...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait, are these...!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait, are these...!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004180_AMELIANCE<tab>...A sage's tools of the trade. They belonged to your father.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004180_AMELIANCE<tab>...A sage's tools of the trade. They belonged to your father.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004190_AMELIANCE<tab>Though he may as well be chained to his desk these days, as a student, he was often called upon to venture into the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004190_AMELIANCE<tab>Though he may as well be chained to his desk these days, as a student, he was often called upon to venture into the field.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004200_AMELIANCE<tab>He wielded those armaments, both to heal and to harm, in no few battles. None so fierce as those you two have braved, perhaps, but battles nonetheless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004200_AMELIANCE<tab>He wielded those armaments, both to heal and to harm, in no few battles. None so fierce as those you two have braved, perhaps, but battles nonetheless.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004210_AMELIANCE<tab>Thus did I pull them out of storage─to show you that he was not always the man who stands in vehement opposition to you now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004210_AMELIANCE<tab>Thus did I pull them out of storage─to show you that he was not always the man who stands in vehement opposition to you now.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004220_AMELIANCE<tab>And also because it would be a terrible waste of ridiculously expensive, House Leveilleur-commissioned artistry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004220_AMELIANCE<tab>And also because it would be a terrible waste of ridiculously expensive, House Leveilleur-commissioned artistry.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004230_AMELIANCE<tab>I am told these devices are quite difficult to master, but someone of your extensive experience should soon have them darting about with grace and aplomb.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004230_AMELIANCE<tab>I am told these devices are quite difficult to master, but someone of your extensive experience should soon have them darting about with grace and aplomb.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004240_AMELIANCE<tab>May the wisdom in that crystal serve you well. And please, try to find common ground with your father, that you might come and go without need for this awful subterfuge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004240_AMELIANCE<tab>May the wisdom in that crystal serve you well. And please, try to find common ground with your father, that you might come and go without need for this awful subterfuge.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004250_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will, Mother, I promise!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004250_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will, Mother, I promise!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004260_AMELIANCE<tab>My final gifts to you, before you run off, are an observation and a suggestion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004260_AMELIANCE<tab>My final gifts to you, before you run off, are an observation and a suggestion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004270_AMELIANCE<tab>Firstly, Fourchenault has ever been a serious man, but it was only after you were born that he truly lost himself in his work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004270_AMELIANCE<tab>Firstly, Fourchenault has ever been a serious man, but it was only after you were born that he truly lost himself in his work.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004280_AMELIANCE<tab>I may not know the Forum's inner workings, but I know your father's. The timing of that change in him holds some significance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004280_AMELIANCE<tab>I may not know the Forum's inner workings, but I know your father's. The timing of that change in him holds some significance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004290_AMELIANCE<tab>Secondly, do not seek to best your father with words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004290_AMELIANCE<tab>Secondly, do not seek to best your father with words.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004300_AMELIANCE<tab>Far better that you simply show him─let him discover the merit of your actions <var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> they cannot be undone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004300_AMELIANCE<tab>Far better that you simply show him─let him discover the merit of your actions <var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> they cannot be undone!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004305_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004305_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004307_ALISAIE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004307_ALISAIE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004310_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, Mother...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004310_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, Mother...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004320_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shall take your wisdom to heart. Thank you again for these gifts, and farewell for now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004320_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shall take your wisdom to heart. Thank you again for these gifts, and farewell for now!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004330_AMELIANCE<tab>Safe travels, my children. Eat well, stay warm, and keep your friends close.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004330_AMELIANCE<tab>Safe travels, my children. Eat well, stay warm, and keep your friends close.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004340_KYTTE<tab>Right, we're all set!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004340_KYTTE<tab>Right, we're all set!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004350_KYTTE<tab>Just the four of you, was it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004350_KYTTE<tab>Just the four of you, was it?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004360_ESTINIEN<tab>Three. I am already attuned to the crystal in Thavnair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004360_ESTINIEN<tab>Three. I am already attuned to the crystal in Thavnair.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004370_KYTTE<tab>You are? Oh. I would have preferred more test subjects...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004370_KYTTE<tab>You are? Oh. I would have preferred more test subjects...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004380_KYTTE<tab>Oh well, never mind. If our three travelers could line up here, please?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004380_KYTTE<tab>Oh well, never mind. If our three travelers could line up here, please?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004390_KYTTE<tab>Yes, right there is fine! Take a deep breath, and I'll soon have you soaring through the aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004390_KYTTE<tab>Yes, right there is fine! Take a deep breath, and I'll soon have you soaring through the aether.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004400_KYTTE<tab>Oh, and one last thing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004400_KYTTE<tab>Oh, and one last thing!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004410_KYTTE<tab>You might experience a teensy-weensy touch of violent aetherial sickness. Good luck!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004410_KYTTE<tab>You might experience a teensy-weensy touch of violent aetherial sickness. Good luck!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004420_THANCRED<tab>Wha─?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004420_THANCRED<tab>Wha─?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>Thavnair, home to city-state Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>Thavnair, home to city-state Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004440_EMETSELCH<tab>Rising from the southeast waters of the Bounty, this isle of plenty served as the battleground for a conflict between two peoples.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004440_EMETSELCH<tab>Rising from the southeast waters of the Bounty, this isle of plenty served as the battleground for a conflict between two peoples.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004450_EMETSELCH<tab>Their cultures bled into one another until a unique amalgamation was distilled from the chaos, in a process not unlike their precious alchemy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004450_EMETSELCH<tab>Their cultures bled into one another until a unique amalgamation was distilled from the chaos, in a process not unlike their precious alchemy.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004460_EMETSELCH<tab>Once solidified as a single nation, an adamant stance of neutrality would hold invaders at bay. For a time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004460_EMETSELCH<tab>Once solidified as a single nation, an adamant stance of neutrality would hold invaders at bay. For a time.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004470_EMETSELCH<tab>Now across this vibrant isle creeps a fog of malice. What choice do you have...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004470_EMETSELCH<tab>Now across this vibrant isle creeps a fog of malice. What choice do you have...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004480_EMETSELCH<tab>...what chance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004480_EMETSELCH<tab>...what chance...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004490_EMETSELCH<tab>...against such an insidious foe?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004490_EMETSELCH<tab>...against such an insidious foe?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004500_ESTINIEN<tab>I've seen fairer faces after a bout of bad shellfish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004500_ESTINIEN<tab>I've seen fairer faces after a bout of bad shellfish.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004510_ESTINIEN<tab>Let me bring you something to drink. That should help settle your bellies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004510_ESTINIEN<tab>Let me bring you something to drink. That should help settle your bellies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004520_THANCRED<tab>There was a note...with Krile's instructions...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004520_THANCRED<tab>There was a note...with Krile's instructions...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004530_THANCRED<tab>Don't let Estinien roam the markets alone... He's alarmingly bad with coin...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004530_THANCRED<tab>Don't let Estinien roam the markets alone... He's alarmingly bad with coin...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004540_THANCRED<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004540_THANCRED<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004550_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Mmm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004550_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Mmm...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004560_ESTINIEN<tab>What happened here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004560_ESTINIEN<tab>What happened here?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004570_THANCRED<tab>Their dress marks them as alchemists. I see no evidence of injury or poison.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004570_THANCRED<tab>Their dress marks them as alchemists. I see no evidence of injury or poison.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004580_URIANGER<tab>Thinkest thou they but slumber?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004580_URIANGER<tab>Thinkest thou they but slumber?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004590_THANCRED<tab>I believe so. Whether it is by <var 1A 02 /var>choice<var 1A 01 /var> is another question entirely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004590_THANCRED<tab>I believe so. Whether it is by <var 1A 02 /var>choice<var 1A 01 /var> is another question entirely.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004600_VARSHAHN<tab>(-???-)Oh, we have guests.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004600_VARSHAHN<tab>(-???-)Oh, we have guests.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004610_VARSHAHN<tab>(-???-)You must excuse the poor welcome. Long days and longer nights have taken their toll, as you can see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004610_VARSHAHN<tab>(-???-)You must excuse the poor welcome. Long days and longer nights have taken their toll, as you can see...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004620_VARSHAHN<tab>I am Varshahn. Servant to the satrap. My task was, in fact, to wake these good men and women. If you will allow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004620_VARSHAHN<tab>I am Varshahn. Servant to the satrap. My task was, in fact, to wake these good men and women. If you will allow.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004630_VARSHAHN<tab>People of the Great Work! I come bearing new scales!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004630_VARSHAHN<tab>People of the Great Work! I come bearing new scales!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004640_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Mmm... Scales...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004640_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Mmm... Scales...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004650_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)We have new scales!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004650_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)We have new scales!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004660_VARSHAHN<tab>Yes, my friends. Gather round. I have them right here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004660_VARSHAHN<tab>Yes, my friends. Gather round. I have them right here.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004670_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>Oh, happy day! Now I can continue my experiment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004670_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>Oh, happy day! Now I can continue my experiment!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004680_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>Many thanks!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004680_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>Many thanks!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004690_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>One for me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004690_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>One for me!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004700_ESTINIEN<tab>Those are dragon scales.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004700_ESTINIEN<tab>Those are dragon scales.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004710_VARSHAHN<tab>Yes─such materials are vital to their most pressing research.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004710_VARSHAHN<tab>Yes─such materials are vital to their most pressing research.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004720_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)And we are fortunate to have them. Our experiments are so close to bearing fruit...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004720_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)And we are fortunate to have them. Our experiments are so close to bearing fruit...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004730_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Soon we will have a talisman capable of nullifying the aetheric emissions from that accursed tower!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004730_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Soon we will have a talisman capable of nullifying the aetheric emissions from that accursed tower!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004740_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Did...did I say something wrong? Are you not here with Varshahn? Wait, who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you people?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004740_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Did...did I say something wrong? Are you not here with Varshahn? Wait, who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you people?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004750_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Of course! You're the one Krile sent─the “Warrior of Light” we've been waiting for!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004750_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Of course! You're the one Krile sent─the “Warrior of Light” we've been waiting for!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004760_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>This is a day of celebration! Praise be to Cinduruva!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004760_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>This is a day of celebration! Praise be to Cinduruva!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004770_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>The winds have shifted. I feel it! The end to our toil is near!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004770_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>The winds have shifted. I feel it! The end to our toil is near!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004780_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>I feel it, too. My head hasn't been this clear in days...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004780_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>I feel it, too. My head hasn't been this clear in days...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004790_ESTINIEN<tab>Tell me, how did you acquire those scales?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004790_ESTINIEN<tab>Tell me, how did you acquire those scales?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004800_VARSHAHN<tab>Curious that it concerns you so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004800_VARSHAHN<tab>Curious that it concerns you so.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004810_VARSHAHN<tab>But worry not. They were freely given by the dragon with whom our satrap has forged a lawful pact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004810_VARSHAHN<tab>But worry not. They were freely given by the dragon with whom our satrap has forged a lawful pact.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004820_ESTINIEN<tab>...That is well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004820_ESTINIEN<tab>...That is well.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004830_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>You must be quite familiar with dragonkin, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004830_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>You must be quite familiar with dragonkin, yes?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004840_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>Is this their congealed blood I see on your weapon?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004840_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>Is this their congealed blood I see on your weapon?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004850_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>Hrm... Speaking of dragon blood...you yourself have been infused with it, have you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004850_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>Hrm... Speaking of dragon blood...you yourself have been infused with it, have you not?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004860_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>I should like to draw a phial or two, if so!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004860_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>I should like to draw a phial or two, if so!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004870_ESTINIEN<tab>Now, see here...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004870_ESTINIEN<tab>Now, see here...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004880_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>Come along, come along! I must <var 1A 02 /var>insist<var 1A 01 /var> that you visit our laboratory!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004880_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>Come along, come along! I must <var 1A 02 /var>insist<var 1A 01 /var> that you visit our laboratory!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004890_ESTINIEN<tab>Cease your shoving, or so help me...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004890_ESTINIEN<tab>Cease your shoving, or so help me...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004900_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Oh dear, your poor companion. What with the new scales and your timely arrival, my colleagues are a little giddy with excitement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004900_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)Oh dear, your poor companion. What with the new scales and your timely arrival, my colleagues are a little giddy with excitement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004910_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)No harm will come to him, I promise! Meanwhile, shall we find a quiet place to talk?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004910_NIDHANA<tab>(-Arkasodara Alchemist-)No harm will come to him, I promise! Meanwhile, shall we find a quiet place to talk?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004920_NIDHANA<tab>As you may have guessed, I am Nidhana─the alchemist who sent the request to your Mistress Krile. We have workshops across the nation collaborating on this research project, but it is here─at the Great Work─where I collate our results.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004920_NIDHANA<tab>As you may have guessed, I am Nidhana─the alchemist who sent the request to your Mistress Krile. We have workshops across the nation collaborating on this research project, but it is here─at the Great Work─where I collate our results.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004930_NIDHANA<tab>Come with me, all of you, and I can explain the crux of the situation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004930_NIDHANA<tab>Come with me, all of you, and I can explain the crux of the situation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004940_NIDHANA<tab>Yes, that would be Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. Hardly anyone has been allowed in or out since our troubles with the tower began.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004940_NIDHANA<tab>Yes, that would be Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. Hardly anyone has been allowed in or out since our troubles with the tower began.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004950_NIDHANA<tab>The fearful citizens huddle inside the city walls, and commerce has all but ground to a standstill. I pity the satrap the trials he must be facing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004950_NIDHANA<tab>The fearful citizens huddle inside the city walls, and commerce has all but ground to a standstill. I pity the satrap the trials he must be facing.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What can you tell me of the satrap?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What can you tell me of the satrap?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Do you trust the satrap?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Do you trust the satrap?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004960_NIDHANA<tab>Well, he... He is the most important person in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004960_NIDHANA<tab>Well, he... He is the most important person in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004970_NIDHANA<tab>Completely! Without the satrap and his line, Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han would not exist.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004970_NIDHANA<tab>Completely! Without the satrap and his line, Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han would not exist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004980_NIDHANA<tab>Long ago, this island was home to two tribes of Matanga─the Gajasura, and the Arkasodara.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004980_NIDHANA<tab>Long ago, this island was home to two tribes of Matanga─the Gajasura, and the Arkasodara.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004990_NIDHANA<tab>When the Au Ra came to these shores, it was the Arkasodara with whom they joined forces. Together, they defeated the warlike Gajasura, forcing them to flee Thavnair altogether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_004990_NIDHANA<tab>When the Au Ra came to these shores, it was the Arkasodara with whom they joined forces. Together, they defeated the warlike Gajasura, forcing them to flee Thavnair altogether.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005000_NIDHANA<tab>Peace and prosperity reigned for a time, until a clan of Hyur from the mainland decided they wanted the island for themselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005000_NIDHANA<tab>Peace and prosperity reigned for a time, until a clan of Hyur from the mainland decided they wanted the island for themselves.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005010_NIDHANA<tab>It was a direct ancestor of the present satrap who arbitrated that conflict, and welded the warring factions into the nation we know today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005010_NIDHANA<tab>It was a direct ancestor of the present satrap who arbitrated that conflict, and welded the warring factions into the nation we know today.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005020_NIDHANA<tab>And ever since, a member of that esteemed lineage has inherited this somewhat unique position. You see, by and large, the state is run by the people, but when problems arise, it is the satrap who mediates a solution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005020_NIDHANA<tab>And ever since, a member of that esteemed lineage has inherited this somewhat unique position. You see, by and large, the state is run by the people, but when problems arise, it is the satrap who mediates a solution.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005030_NIDHANA<tab>The stability provided by the satrap is what has allowed Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han to thrive all these years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005030_NIDHANA<tab>The stability provided by the satrap is what has allowed Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han to thrive all these years.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005040_NIDHANA<tab>And it was the satrap himself who entrusted us with this duty. We will not fail him, nor our countrymen!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005040_NIDHANA<tab>And it was the satrap himself who entrusted us with this duty. We will not fail him, nor our countrymen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005050_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>What is the delay with the vessel!? I told you, I need to adjust those ratios!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005050_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>What is the delay with the vessel!? I told you, I need to adjust those ratios!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005060_FANDANIEL<tab>I come all this way to admire one of my splendid towers, and what do I find? Fools attempting to ward off its tempering influence with magic trinkets.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005060_FANDANIEL<tab>I come all this way to admire one of my splendid towers, and what do I find? Fools attempting to ward off its tempering influence with magic trinkets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005070_FANDANIEL<tab>I seem to recall a similar experiment in ages past. What <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> that man's name...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005070_FANDANIEL<tab>I seem to recall a similar experiment in ages past. What <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> that man's name...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005080_FANDANIEL<tab>“O” something... Oween?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005080_FANDANIEL<tab>“O” something... Oween?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005090_FANDANIEL<tab>Another body, another time. Who could be expected to remember every trivial detail...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005090_FANDANIEL<tab>Another body, another time. Who could be expected to remember every trivial detail...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005100_AMON<tab>Another body, another time. Who could be expected to remember every trivial detail...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005100_AMON<tab>Another body, another time. Who could be expected to remember every trivial detail...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005110_AMON<tab>Hmmm. Allowing them to construct such handy talismans would be counterproductive to my plans...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005110_AMON<tab>Hmmm. Allowing them to construct such handy talismans would be counterproductive to my plans...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005120_AMON<tab>And yet, I find myself deathly curious. How <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> they manage this feat with the limited knowledge and resources at their disposal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005120_AMON<tab>And yet, I find myself deathly curious. How <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> they manage this feat with the limited knowledge and resources at their disposal?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005130_AMON<tab>Complications be damned. For we cannot escape the nature of our souls. And I, as ever, am my own worst enemy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005130_AMON<tab>Complications be damned. For we cannot escape the nature of our souls. And I, as ever, am my own worst enemy.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005140_THANCRED<tab>I see our taskmasters have allowed you a moment's respite as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005140_THANCRED<tab>I see our taskmasters have allowed you a moment's respite as well.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005150_THANCRED<tab>You have to hand it to these alchemists─they are determined to see this endeavor of theirs succeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005150_THANCRED<tab>You have to hand it to these alchemists─they are determined to see this endeavor of theirs succeed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005160_THANCRED<tab>I've never been one for blind optimism, but I sincerely get the sense they're close to a breakthrough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005160_THANCRED<tab>I've never been one for blind optimism, but I sincerely get the sense they're close to a breakthrough.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005170_ESTINIEN<tab>They had better be, or all this effort was for naught...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005170_ESTINIEN<tab>They had better be, or all this effort was for naught...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005180_URIANGER<tab>The peoples of Eorzea, of the Far East, of Thavnair... Children of this star united in common cause against a dire threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005180_URIANGER<tab>The peoples of Eorzea, of the Far East, of Thavnair... Children of this star united in common cause against a dire threat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005190_URIANGER<tab>Yet ere they succumbed to suicidal madness, were not the Telophoroi born of Her body, as were we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005190_URIANGER<tab>Yet ere they succumbed to suicidal madness, were not the Telophoroi born of Her body, as were we?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005200_URIANGER<tab>They who cling to life and the promise of the morrow's dawn, 'gainst they who desire death and an ending of their own orchestration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005200_URIANGER<tab>They who cling to life and the promise of the morrow's dawn, 'gainst they who desire death and an ending of their own orchestration.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005210_URIANGER<tab>The victors of this war alone will hold the right to answer the question of existence. Of its meaning, and its worth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005210_URIANGER<tab>The victors of this war alone will hold the right to answer the question of existence. Of its meaning, and its worth.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005220_THANCRED<tab>Poetic and ominous to a fault. That said, if it's an existential debate in nature, then our arguments might not be as persuasive as you'd think.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005220_THANCRED<tab>Poetic and ominous to a fault. That said, if it's an existential debate in nature, then our arguments might not be as persuasive as you'd think.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005230_THANCRED<tab>Fandaniel wants to die, and take everyone with him in an orgy of pain and suffering. An utterly vile and unforgivable idea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005230_THANCRED<tab>Fandaniel wants to die, and take everyone with him in an orgy of pain and suffering. An utterly vile and unforgivable idea.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005240_THANCRED<tab>And yet, when spat upon by fate and wailing in the deepest pit of despair, who among us can say they have not entertained similar thoughts?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005240_THANCRED<tab>And yet, when spat upon by fate and wailing in the deepest pit of despair, who among us can say they have not entertained similar thoughts?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005250_THANCRED<tab>There are nights black as pitch. Bereft of hope. When no words of comfort can reach you, and it's all you can do to grit your teeth and choke back the bile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005250_THANCRED<tab>There are nights black as pitch. Bereft of hope. When no words of comfort can reach you, and it's all you can do to grit your teeth and choke back the bile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005260_ESTINIEN<tab>The more you see and suffer life's injustices, the more difficult they become to bear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005260_ESTINIEN<tab>The more you see and suffer life's injustices, the more difficult they become to bear.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005270_ESTINIEN<tab>Vengeance is nurtured in similar soil. Though your anger has a broader focus, the sentiment is much the same: a fervent desire to destroy others; to see them drown in torment, as you have.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005270_ESTINIEN<tab>Vengeance is nurtured in similar soil. Though your anger has a broader focus, the sentiment is much the same: a fervent desire to destroy others; to see them drown in torment, as you have.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005280_THANCRED<tab>That about sums it up. The will to endure is not always as strong as the urge to burn it all down and salt the earth, survival be damned. It's a struggle─often close and brutal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005280_THANCRED<tab>That about sums it up. The will to endure is not always as strong as the urge to burn it all down and salt the earth, survival be damned. It's a struggle─often close and brutal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005290_URIANGER<tab>Indeed... Well. I, for one, shall pray survival proveth more appealing in the end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005290_URIANGER<tab>Indeed... Well. I, for one, shall pray survival proveth more appealing in the end.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005300_THANCRED<tab>As will I. Besides, our chances are much improved when we've the company of others committed to the cause of life. Our vengeful dragoon here is proof of that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005300_THANCRED<tab>As will I. Besides, our chances are much improved when we've the company of others committed to the cause of life. Our vengeful dragoon here is proof of that.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005310_THANCRED<tab>What is it? What did you see?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005310_THANCRED<tab>What is it? What did you see?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005320_THANCRED<tab>Fandaniel? Are you sure? If he knows we've been working on a countermeasure...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005320_THANCRED<tab>Fandaniel? Are you sure? If he knows we've been working on a countermeasure...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005330_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>It holds...the vessel holds! This is the one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005330_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKA<tab>It holds...the vessel holds! This is the one.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005340_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>At long last!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005340_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKB<tab>At long last!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005350_NIDHANA<tab>Look! We have finally created a talisman strong enough to withstand our experiments!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005350_NIDHANA<tab>Look! We have finally created a talisman strong enough to withstand our experiments!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005360_NIDHANA<tab>We've named it a “warding scale”─for the time being. With this in your possession, your soul should be completely shielded from corruptive aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005360_NIDHANA<tab>We've named it a “warding scale”─for the time being. With this in your possession, your soul should be completely shielded from corruptive aether.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005370_URIANGER<tab>Afforded such protection, any one of us may approach the towers without fear. Thou hast mine admiration─'tis an invention of historical significance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005370_URIANGER<tab>Afforded such protection, any one of us may approach the towers without fear. Thou hast mine admiration─'tis an invention of historical significance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005380_NIDHANA<tab>I thank you for your kind words! But I would prefer you keep them unsaid until we test the talisman's efficacy in the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005380_NIDHANA<tab>I thank you for your kind words! But I would prefer you keep them unsaid until we test the talisman's efficacy in the field.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005390_NIDHANA<tab>It is for the next stage of our plan that we summoned you in the first place: to accompany me to the Tower of Zot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005390_NIDHANA<tab>It is for the next stage of our plan that we summoned you in the first place: to accompany me to the Tower of Zot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005400_NIDHANA<tab>Should the scale prove effective─as I very much hope it will─then you'll have little to do. But should the effect be weaker than anticipated, I must ask that you restrain me. Or knock me senseless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005400_NIDHANA<tab>Should the scale prove effective─as I very much hope it will─then you'll have little to do. But should the effect be weaker than anticipated, I must ask that you restrain me. Or knock me senseless.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Let's hope it doesn't come to that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Let's hope it doesn't come to that.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Oh, you needn't ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Oh, you needn't ask.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005410_NIDHANA<tab>Either way, we are fortunate to have you with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005410_NIDHANA<tab>Either way, we are fortunate to have you with us.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005420_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>Nidhana, I... Are you certain you wish to do this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005420_ALCHEMISTOFTHEGREATWORKC<tab>Nidhana, I... Are you certain you wish to do this?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005430_NIDHANA<tab>If others are to trust our creations, then we must have faith in them first. And as the senior researcher, it falls to me to lead by example.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005430_NIDHANA<tab>If others are to trust our creations, then we must have faith in them first. And as the senior researcher, it falls to me to lead by example.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005440_NIDHANA<tab>But...should I fail to return, then learn what you can from this attempt and apply it to the next. Our work must continue. Is that clear?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005440_NIDHANA<tab>But...should I fail to return, then learn what you can from this attempt and apply it to the next. Our work must continue. Is that clear?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005450_THANCRED<tab>We'll keep an eye on the place while you're away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005450_THANCRED<tab>We'll keep an eye on the place while you're away.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005460_THANCRED<tab>Assuming Fandaniel is lurking about, there's no telling what mischief he has in mind for us─or you. Be on your guard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005460_THANCRED<tab>Assuming Fandaniel is lurking about, there's no telling what mischief he has in mind for us─or you. Be on your guard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005470_NIDHANA<tab>Shall we be on our way? I'll have one of the soldiers at the hatchery prepare us a boat, and we can set out from the northern shore. I'll see you there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005470_NIDHANA<tab>Shall we be on our way? I'll have one of the soldiers at the hatchery prepare us a boat, and we can set out from the northern shore. I'll see you there.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005480_NIDHANA<tab>We should soon cross the threshold of the tower's influence...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005480_NIDHANA<tab>We should soon cross the threshold of the tower's influence...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005490_NIDHANA<tab>Any moment now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005490_NIDHANA<tab>Any moment now...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005500_NIDHANA<tab>It's working!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005500_NIDHANA<tab>It's working!
