source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005510_NIDHANA<tab>And you─you are still yourself? Then I'd like to see how it fares closer to the tower, if we could.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005510_NIDHANA<tab>And you─you are still yourself? Then I'd like to see how it fares closer to the tower, if we could.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005520_NIDHANA<tab>So far, so good. The scale's protection appears to be holding. If we can just make it to the tower's entrance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005520_NIDHANA<tab>So far, so good. The scale's protection appears to be holding. If we can just make it to the tower's entrance...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005530_NIDHANA<tab>A few more steps!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005530_NIDHANA<tab>A few more steps!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005540_NIDHANA<tab>Praise be to the Sisters! We made it! And the scale has proven itself to be everything we hoped it would be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005540_NIDHANA<tab>Praise be to the Sisters! We made it! And the scale has proven itself to be everything we hoped it would be.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005550_NIDHANA<tab>Now we can focus on production. Once we've equipped and returned with an entire survey team, this menace will soon give up its secrets!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005550_NIDHANA<tab>Now we can focus on production. Once we've equipped and returned with an entire survey team, this menace will soon give up its secrets!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005560_NIDHANA<tab>What─!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005560_NIDHANA<tab>What─!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005570_NIDHANA<tab>Aaah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005570_NIDHANA<tab>Aaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005580_NIDHANA<tab>Let me go! ...Let me <var 1A 02 /var>go<var 1A 01 /var>! Rrrgh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005580_NIDHANA<tab>Let me go! ...Let me <var 1A 02 /var>go<var 1A 01 /var>! Rrrgh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005590_FANDANIEL<tab>Oh, do calm down. You'll only hurt yourself thrashing about like that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005590_FANDANIEL<tab>Oh, do calm down. You'll only hurt yourself thrashing about like that.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005600_NIDHANA<tab>Stop! You can't do this! Please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005600_NIDHANA<tab>Stop! You can't do this! Please!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005610_FANDANIEL<tab>A little late for heroics, I'm afraid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005610_FANDANIEL<tab>A little late for heroics, I'm afraid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005620_FANDANIEL<tab>Hmm...the similarities are striking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005620_FANDANIEL<tab>Hmm...the similarities are striking.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005630_FANDANIEL<tab>My, my, such <var 1A 02 /var>hostility<var 1A 01 /var>. Never before has my artistry so displeased.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005630_FANDANIEL<tab>My, my, such <var 1A 02 /var>hostility<var 1A 01 /var>. Never before has my artistry so displeased.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005640_FANDANIEL<tab>My patrons of old would've positively squealed in delight! Though, between you and me, I find gushing praise exhausting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005640_FANDANIEL<tab>My patrons of old would've positively squealed in delight! Though, between you and me, I find gushing praise exhausting.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Patrons of old?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Patrons of old?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What are you talking about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What are you talking about?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005650_FANDANIEL<tab>Allow me to tell you a story. Surely you've yet to hear the one about Fandaniel, the sundered Ascian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005650_FANDANIEL<tab>Allow me to tell you a story. Surely you've yet to hear the one about Fandaniel, the sundered Ascian.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005660_FANDANIEL<tab>I inherited the position─and the soul─of the Fandaniel who sat on the Convocation in the time of the Final Days. Theoretically speaking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005660_FANDANIEL<tab>I inherited the position─and the soul─of the Fandaniel who sat on the Convocation in the time of the Final Days. Theoretically speaking.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005670_FANDANIEL<tab>Practically speaking, that fact is of no consequence! I was born and lived as...well. Me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005670_FANDANIEL<tab>Practically speaking, that fact is of no consequence! I was born and lived as...well. Me.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005680_FANDANIEL<tab>Eventually I was recruited into the Ascians and imbued with the former Fandaniel's knowledge and memories, but I never felt that they were truly a part of who I am.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005680_FANDANIEL<tab>Eventually I was recruited into the Ascians and imbued with the former Fandaniel's knowledge and memories, but I never felt that they were truly a part of who I am.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005690_FANDANIEL<tab>How to explain? Perhaps if I told you who I was before my Ascian embrace. Although that chapter, too, is a past I've long since discarded.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005690_FANDANIEL<tab>How to explain? Perhaps if I told you who I was before my Ascian embrace. Although that chapter, too, is a past I've long since discarded.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005700_FANDANIEL<tab>I have it on good authority you've poked your nose into an Allagan ruin or two, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005700_FANDANIEL<tab>I have it on good authority you've poked your nose into an Allagan ruin or two, yes?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005710_FANDANIEL<tab>Then I expect you've heard of me. The old me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005710_FANDANIEL<tab>Then I expect you've heard of me. The old me.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005720_FANDANIEL<tab>Amon, at your service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005720_FANDANIEL<tab>Amon, at your service.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005730_AMON<tab>Amon, at your service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005730_AMON<tab>Amon, at your service.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005740_AMON<tab>Imagine a nation of unbridled prosperity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005740_AMON<tab>Imagine a nation of unbridled prosperity.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005750_AMON<tab>Every need, met; day after day of unbroken, unshakable peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005750_AMON<tab>Every need, met; day after day of unbroken, unshakable peace.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005760_AMON<tab>Existence, fulfilled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005760_AMON<tab>Existence, fulfilled.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005770_AMON<tab>And ripe for decay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005770_AMON<tab>And ripe for decay.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005780_ALLAGMAN<tab>You are a genius without peer, Amon. How ever do you conceive of such delightful experiments?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005780_ALLAGMAN<tab>You are a genius without peer, Amon. How ever do you conceive of such delightful experiments?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005790_ALLAGMAN<tab>That fool was beside himself with panic when he awoke with the head of a bull! Even his cries for help emerged as so much guttural lowing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005790_ALLAGMAN<tab>That fool was beside himself with panic when he awoke with the head of a bull! Even his cries for help emerged as so much guttural lowing!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005800_ALLAGMAN<tab>Oh, the memory of it... Haha, my poor sides! My friends and I were so consumed by laughter we struggled to breathe!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005800_ALLAGMAN<tab>Oh, the memory of it... Haha, my poor sides! My friends and I were so consumed by laughter we struggled to breathe!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005810_AMON<tab>No more than entertainment for bored wastrels ignorant of its worth. My all-consuming work...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005810_AMON<tab>No more than entertainment for bored wastrels ignorant of its worth. My all-consuming work...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005820_AMON<tab>But it was not their only indulgence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005820_AMON<tab>But it was not their only indulgence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005830_AMON<tab>For they were ever hungry for stimulation. Slaves to the slightest hint that amusement was afoot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005830_AMON<tab>For they were ever hungry for stimulation. Slaves to the slightest hint that amusement was afoot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005840_AMON<tab>Our nation was ailing...but I would see the poison purged.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005840_AMON<tab>Our nation was ailing...but I would see the poison purged.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005850_AMON<tab>I resurrected a legend─our first and greatest emperor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005850_AMON<tab>I resurrected a legend─our first and greatest emperor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005860_AMON<tab>And just as I had planned, he set our wayward empire back on the path of conquest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005860_AMON<tab>And just as I had planned, he set our wayward empire back on the path of conquest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005870_AMON<tab>An inexhaustible ambition carried us onwards, always onwards.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005870_AMON<tab>An inexhaustible ambition carried us onwards, always onwards.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005880_AMON<tab>Yet he who delivered to us such glory was not to be satisfied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005880_AMON<tab>Yet he who delivered to us such glory was not to be satisfied.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005890_XANDE<tab>Heed me, Amon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005890_XANDE<tab>Heed me, Amon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005900_XANDE<tab>No matter how vast one's empire, or full one's treasure vault, all is rendered meaningless by death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005900_XANDE<tab>No matter how vast one's empire, or full one's treasure vault, all is rendered meaningless by death.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005910_XANDE<tab>In the end, all is lost...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005910_XANDE<tab>In the end, all is lost...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005920_EMETSELCH<tab>You know as well as I that the emperor stands to lose this war. And so I have come to claim you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005920_EMETSELCH<tab>You know as well as I that the emperor stands to lose this war. And so I have come to claim you.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005930_EMETSELCH<tab>For while your methods leave something to be desired, we cannot deny the results of your work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005930_EMETSELCH<tab>For while your methods leave something to be desired, we cannot deny the results of your work.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005940_EMETSELCH<tab>And as fortune would have it, the seat of Fandaniel─your rightful seat─lies vacant and waiting. Take your place amongst your peers, rather than die a pointless death amidst the ashes of your doomed nation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005940_EMETSELCH<tab>And as fortune would have it, the seat of Fandaniel─your rightful seat─lies vacant and waiting. Take your place amongst your peers, rather than die a pointless death amidst the ashes of your doomed nation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005950_EMETSELCH<tab>Send one of your clones to the Crystal Tower that you might see for yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005950_EMETSELCH<tab>Send one of your clones to the Crystal Tower that you might see for yourself.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005960_EMETSELCH<tab>See what lies ahead...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005960_EMETSELCH<tab>See what lies ahead...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005970_AMON<tab>The fall of the empire affirmed the truth. Majestic and tragic...as the emperor foresaw.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005970_AMON<tab>The fall of the empire affirmed the truth. Majestic and tragic...as the emperor foresaw.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005980_AMON<tab>Scheme as you like, build as you will. Nothing endures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005980_AMON<tab>Scheme as you like, build as you will. Nothing endures.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005990_AMON<tab>What is life, but a brief jaunt ending in emptiness?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_005990_AMON<tab>What is life, but a brief jaunt ending in emptiness?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006000_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)So easily distracted! Why, I almost left without saying farewell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006000_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)So easily distracted! Why, I almost left without saying farewell.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006010_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)As for your friend, you needn't worry─these pawns are far more useful to me alive as fuel for the primals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006010_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)As for your friend, you needn't worry─these pawns are far more useful to me alive as fuel for the primals.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006020_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)Ah ah ah! If you attempt to pull them free, they <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> die, so─enjoy tackling that conundrum with your comrades!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006020_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)Ah ah ah! If you attempt to pull them free, they <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> die, so─enjoy tackling that conundrum with your comrades!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006030_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)We shall meet again! Not in one of these minor spires, oh no, but somewhere more suitably grandiose. Your favorite playmate is ever so eager to see you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006030_FANDANIEL<tab>(-Fandaniel-)We shall meet again! Not in one of these minor spires, oh no, but somewhere more suitably grandiose. Your favorite playmate is ever so eager to see you.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006040_EMETSELCH<tab>A vast rock squats upon Thavnair, and to its stony surface clings the city of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006040_EMETSELCH<tab>A vast rock squats upon Thavnair, and to its stony surface clings the city of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006050_EMETSELCH<tab>Ye who enter here are subject to the scrutiny of gods─the gate's most watchful eye.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006050_EMETSELCH<tab>Ye who enter here are subject to the scrutiny of gods─the gate's most watchful eye.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006060_EMETSELCH<tab>The orb which beholdeth the truth of all things.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006060_EMETSELCH<tab>The orb which beholdeth the truth of all things.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006070_EMETSELCH<tab>Pass beneath its hot and piercing gaze, bearing down like a second midday sun.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006070_EMETSELCH<tab>Pass beneath its hot and piercing gaze, bearing down like a second midday sun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006080_EMETSELCH<tab>The fragrant haze a mixture of sweet incense and acrid smoke. The cries of merchants mingled here with lively melodies accented by dancers' feet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006080_EMETSELCH<tab>The fragrant haze a mixture of sweet incense and acrid smoke. The cries of merchants mingled here with lively melodies accented by dancers' feet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006090_EMETSELCH<tab>Travelers seduced by vivid sound and colors were once swallowed up by patchwork streets.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006090_EMETSELCH<tab>Travelers seduced by vivid sound and colors were once swallowed up by patchwork streets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006100_EMETSELCH<tab>But no such scenes to savor now. To what somber present does that divine eye bear witness?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006100_EMETSELCH<tab>But no such scenes to savor now. To what somber present does that divine eye bear witness?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006110_VARSHAHN<tab>Here we are: Meghaduta.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006110_VARSHAHN<tab>Here we are: Meghaduta.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006120_VARSHAHN<tab>It seems a shame to bring you here directly. Under normal circumstances, it would have been my pleasure to show you the sights.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006120_VARSHAHN<tab>It seems a shame to bring you here directly. Under normal circumstances, it would have been my pleasure to show you the sights.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006130_THANCRED<tab>And it would have been our pleasure to see them. Alas, it seems our tour of the city will have to wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006130_THANCRED<tab>And it would have been our pleasure to see them. Alas, it seems our tour of the city will have to wait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006140_VARSHAHN<tab>I am afraid so. Come, we should head inside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006140_VARSHAHN<tab>I am afraid so. Come, we should head inside.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006150_VARSHAHN<tab>Your Excellency, may I present our honored visitors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006150_VARSHAHN<tab>Your Excellency, may I present our honored visitors.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006160_AWAHEEN<tab>(-His Excellency-)Ah, splendid, most splendid!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006160_AWAHEEN<tab>(-His Excellency-)Ah, splendid, most splendid!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006170_AWAHEEN<tab>Allow me to introduce myself. I am Ahewann, satrap of Radz-at-Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006170_AWAHEEN<tab>Allow me to introduce myself. I am Ahewann, satrap of Radz-at-Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006180_AWAHEEN<tab>Our alchemists tell me your assistance was invaluable in the creation of the warding scale.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006180_AWAHEEN<tab>Our alchemists tell me your assistance was invaluable in the creation of the warding scale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006190_AWAHEEN<tab>Such deeds ought to be recognized in person, thus did I have young Varshahn convey you here forthwith. On behalf of my people, may I express to you our sincere gratitude.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006190_AWAHEEN<tab>Such deeds ought to be recognized in person, thus did I have young Varshahn convey you here forthwith. On behalf of my people, may I express to you our sincere gratitude.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>But Nidhana, she was taken...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>But Nidhana, she was taken...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not everything went to plan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not everything went to plan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006200_AWAHEEN<tab>A regrettable incident, indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006200_AWAHEEN<tab>A regrettable incident, indeed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006210_AWAHEEN<tab>I assume you speak of Nidhana? A regrettable incident, indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006210_AWAHEEN<tab>I assume you speak of Nidhana? A regrettable incident, indeed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006220_AWAHEEN<tab>Her colleagues insist that we honor her wishes, and trust in the talisman─that it will be instrumental in saving Nidhana and the others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006220_AWAHEEN<tab>Her colleagues insist that we honor her wishes, and trust in the talisman─that it will be instrumental in saving Nidhana and the others.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006230_AWAHEEN<tab>I am eager to hear your opinion on the matter, so let us not stand on ceremony. Come, sit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006230_AWAHEEN<tab>I am eager to hear your opinion on the matter, so let us not stand on ceremony. Come, sit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006240_ESTINIEN<tab>I think not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006240_ESTINIEN<tab>I think not.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006250_ESTINIEN<tab>This charade has gone on long enough. Show yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006250_ESTINIEN<tab>This charade has gone on long enough. Show yourself.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006260_AWAHEEN<tab>Forgive me, but were you expecting musicians perhaps? There are no performers waiting in the wings at present, but arrangements could be made if you'd prefer─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006260_AWAHEEN<tab>Forgive me, but were you expecting musicians perhaps? There are no performers waiting in the wings at present, but arrangements could be made if you'd prefer─

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006270_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)Nay, he hath the right of it─the time for artifice is past. Raise the curtain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006270_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)Nay, he hath the right of it─the time for artifice is past. Raise the curtain.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006280_AWAHEEN<tab>As you wish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006280_AWAHEEN<tab>As you wish.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006290_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)You travel as assistants to the Students of Baldesion, but you are known to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006290_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)You travel as assistants to the Students of Baldesion, but you are known to me.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006300_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)Even here have we heard of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006300_VRITRA<tab>(-???-)Even here have we heard of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006310_VRITRA<tab>I am Vrtra, and for years uncounted hath this isle served as mine abode.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006310_VRITRA<tab>I am Vrtra, and for years uncounted hath this isle served as mine abode.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006320_URIANGER<tab>Vrtra! Of the first brood, sibling to Hraesvelgr and Nidhogg!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006320_URIANGER<tab>Vrtra! Of the first brood, sibling to Hraesvelgr and Nidhogg!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006330_VRITRA<tab>Aye, mine elder brothers. Of Midgardsormr's spawn, I was last to hatch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006330_VRITRA<tab>Aye, mine elder brothers. Of Midgardsormr's spawn, I was last to hatch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006340_THANCRED<tab>Well, isn't this a surprise! We were told Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han had an alliance with a dragon, not that a great wyrm sat in the satrap's own hall...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006340_THANCRED<tab>Well, isn't this a surprise! We were told Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han had an alliance with a dragon, not that a great wyrm sat in the satrap's own hall...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006350_AWAHEEN<tab>A necessary subterfuge, as the true tale of our nation's history illustrates most effectively.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006350_AWAHEEN<tab>A necessary subterfuge, as the true tale of our nation's history illustrates most effectively.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006360_AWAHEEN<tab>In the beginning, the rock upon which our city is built was home to Vrtra, and Vrtra alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006360_AWAHEEN<tab>In the beginning, the rock upon which our city is built was home to Vrtra, and Vrtra alone.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006370_AWAHEEN<tab>In time, the ancestors of the Matanga came to the island and established a foothold, but never did they dare disturb the wyrm's lair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006370_AWAHEEN<tab>In time, the ancestors of the Matanga came to the island and established a foothold, but never did they dare disturb the wyrm's lair.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006380_AWAHEEN<tab>Next to arrive were the Au Ra. Adopting the example of their Arkasodara allies, they too treated Vrtra with reverence and respect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006380_AWAHEEN<tab>Next to arrive were the Au Ra. Adopting the example of their Arkasodara allies, they too treated Vrtra with reverence and respect.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006390_AWAHEEN<tab>And for many years, an understanding between our forefathers and the great wyrm endured...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006390_AWAHEEN<tab>And for many years, an understanding between our forefathers and the great wyrm endured...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006400_AWAHEEN<tab>...Until marauding Hyurs from the mainland came, threatening to shatter our peace and tranquility.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006400_AWAHEEN<tab>...Until marauding Hyurs from the mainland came, threatening to shatter our peace and tranquility.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006410_AWAHEEN<tab>When it seemed all would be drowned in blood, Vrtra himself came forth and quelled the rising conflict.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006410_AWAHEEN<tab>When it seemed all would be drowned in blood, Vrtra himself came forth and quelled the rising conflict.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006420_AWAHEEN<tab>A peaceful accord was reached, and oaths sworn in Vrtra's name. Thus began the dragon's governance of the fledgling state which was to grow into Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006420_AWAHEEN<tab>A peaceful accord was reached, and oaths sworn in Vrtra's name. Thus began the dragon's governance of the fledgling state which was to grow into Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006430_THANCRED<tab>But... If Vrtra is still here, then your position as satrap is just...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006430_THANCRED<tab>But... If Vrtra is still here, then your position as satrap is just...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006440_AWAHEEN<tab>...A “charade”? Yes, and one which my family has performed faithfully for generations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006440_AWAHEEN<tab>...A “charade”? Yes, and one which my family has performed faithfully for generations.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006450_VRITRA<tab>Many envy the great wyrms their power. Were it known that I ruled here, then the fires of war would burn without end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006450_VRITRA<tab>Many envy the great wyrms their power. Were it known that I ruled here, then the fires of war would burn without end.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006460_VRITRA<tab>I would not be the flame which consumeth my people. Those few who joined me in laying our country's foundations were, perforce, sworn to secrecy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006460_VRITRA<tab>I would not be the flame which consumeth my people. Those few who joined me in laying our country's foundations were, perforce, sworn to secrecy.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006470_ESTINIEN<tab>Your eye. It was taken?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006470_ESTINIEN<tab>Your eye. It was taken?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006480_VARSHAHN<tab>'Tis here. Buried within this semblance of flesh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006480_VARSHAHN<tab>'Tis here. Buried within this semblance of flesh.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006490_VARSHAHN<tab>The body before thee is but a simulacrum, constructed by the finest artisans of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. With mine eye nestled within, it doth serve as an inconspicuous vessel for my will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006490_VARSHAHN<tab>The body before thee is but a simulacrum, constructed by the finest artisans of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. With mine eye nestled within, it doth serve as an inconspicuous vessel for my will.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006500_ESTINIEN<tab>Ah. That would explain why I felt the presence of a dragon upon our first meeting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006500_ESTINIEN<tab>Ah. That would explain why I felt the presence of a dragon upon our first meeting.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006510_VARSHAHN<tab>I am woven with wards fashioned to deceive such arcane senses.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006510_VARSHAHN<tab>I am woven with wards fashioned to deceive such arcane senses.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006520_VARSHAHN<tab>Though 'twas short-lived, it seemeth thy fusion with my brother hath left thee much altered, Estinien Wyrmblood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006520_VARSHAHN<tab>Though 'twas short-lived, it seemeth thy fusion with my brother hath left thee much altered, Estinien Wyrmblood.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006530_VARSHAHN<tab>From the very first, we sensed the nature of one another. Yet did neither one of us bare his fangs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006530_VARSHAHN<tab>From the very first, we sensed the nature of one another. Yet did neither one of us bare his fangs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006540_VARSHAHN<tab>That is all I need know of thee for now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006540_VARSHAHN<tab>That is all I need know of thee for now.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006550_VRITRA<tab>With my secret thus revealed, I have for you a proposal. Not as a wyrm of the first brood, but as the ruler of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006550_VRITRA<tab>With my secret thus revealed, I have for you a proposal. Not as a wyrm of the first brood, but as the ruler of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006560_VRITRA<tab>With all haste must we take in hand the finished talismans and breach this foul spire. Thence, should it lay within our power, dispel its wicked influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006560_VRITRA<tab>With all haste must we take in hand the finished talismans and breach this foul spire. Thence, should it lay within our power, dispel its wicked influence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006570_VRITRA<tab>Yet even with the assurance of the warding scales, the narrow confines of the tower doth limit the size of our force.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006570_VRITRA<tab>Yet even with the assurance of the warding scales, the narrow confines of the tower doth limit the size of our force.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006580_URIANGER<tab>And thus denied strength in numbers, thou must choose thy soldiers with care.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006580_URIANGER<tab>And thus denied strength in numbers, thou must choose thy soldiers with care.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006590_VRITRA<tab>Just so. Yet though our Radiant Host is formidable, I see a surer path before me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006590_VRITRA<tab>Just so. Yet though our Radiant Host is formidable, I see a surer path before me.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006600_VRITRA<tab>Thou and thy comrades have contended with a multitude of primal beings. Most recently thou didst cast down false gods in Paglth'an and Carteneau, I am told.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006600_VRITRA<tab>Thou and thy comrades have contended with a multitude of primal beings. Most recently thou didst cast down false gods in Paglth'an and Carteneau, I am told.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006610_VRITRA<tab>'Tis upon that strength I would call. The Scions have proven themselves most capable, and I ask that you serve as the tip of our spear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006610_VRITRA<tab>'Tis upon that strength I would call. The Scions have proven themselves most capable, and I ask that you serve as the tip of our spear.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006620_VRITRA<tab>Talismans would, of course, be provided for each of thy companions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006620_VRITRA<tab>Talismans would, of course, be provided for each of thy companions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006630_VRITRA<tab>And should you agree to this undertaking, more will be provided to make use of as you see fit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006630_VRITRA<tab>And should you agree to this undertaking, more will be provided to make use of as you see fit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006640_THANCRED<tab>There's no denying it's a dangerous proposition, but the rewards may far outweigh the risk. Just think of what we might accomplish if we could equip all our allies with warding scales.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006640_THANCRED<tab>There's no denying it's a dangerous proposition, but the rewards may far outweigh the risk. Just think of what we might accomplish if we could equip all our allies with warding scales.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006650_THANCRED<tab>I worry, however, that even the four of us may be too few for what you have in mind. Might we regroup with our friends first to discuss the matter?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006650_THANCRED<tab>I worry, however, that even the four of us may be too few for what you have in mind. Might we regroup with our friends first to discuss the matter?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006660_VRITRA<tab>'Tis no trifling task that I have laid before you. Go, steel your hearts and hone your plans─such time as you require shall we spend in crafting your protective charms.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006660_VRITRA<tab>'Tis no trifling task that I have laid before you. Go, steel your hearts and hone your plans─such time as you require shall we spend in crafting your protective charms.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006670_THANCRED<tab>It seems a quick trip back to Sharlayan is in order...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006670_THANCRED<tab>It seems a quick trip back to Sharlayan is in order...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006680_VRITRA<tab>Wilt thou not lend thine aid?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006680_VRITRA<tab>Wilt thou not lend thine aid?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006690_ESTINIEN<tab>Whether your request be made as a great wyrm or the ruler of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, I see no reason to refuse. Nor will I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006690_ESTINIEN<tab>Whether your request be made as a great wyrm or the ruler of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, I see no reason to refuse. Nor will I.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006700_VRITRA<tab>I am in thy debt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006700_VRITRA<tab>I am in thy debt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006710_KRILE<tab>Your time in Thavnair has certainly been eventful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006710_KRILE<tab>Your time in Thavnair has certainly been eventful.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006720_KRILE<tab>In my opinion, carrying out Vrtra's request and assaulting the Tower of Zot should be our highest priority.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006720_KRILE<tab>In my opinion, carrying out Vrtra's request and assaulting the Tower of Zot should be our highest priority.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006730_YSHTOLA<tab>I agree. While I still have questions concerning the Forum and their grand undertaking, we have all but exhausted our avenues of investigation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006730_YSHTOLA<tab>I agree. While I still have questions concerning the Forum and their grand undertaking, we have all but exhausted our avenues of investigation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006740_YSHTOLA<tab>Simply pressing them any harder on the subject will almost certainly result in our expulsion. Therefore I suggest we explore the aetherial sea connection by way of a letter to Master Matoya, then make our way to Thavnair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006740_YSHTOLA<tab>Simply pressing them any harder on the subject will almost certainly result in our expulsion. Therefore I suggest we explore the aetherial sea connection by way of a letter to Master Matoya, then make our way to Thavnair.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006750_ALPHINAUD<tab>I wonder... Even with the protection these talismans afford us, what can we hope to achieve once inside the tower?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006750_ALPHINAUD<tab>I wonder... Even with the protection these talismans afford us, what can we hope to achieve once inside the tower?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006760_ALPHINAUD<tab>According to Arenvald and Fordola's report, they were unable to free the Amalj'aa. Worse, their attempts triggered the tower's defenses, which led to a summoning of Lunar Ifrit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006760_ALPHINAUD<tab>According to Arenvald and Fordola's report, they were unable to free the Amalj'aa. Worse, their attempts triggered the tower's defenses, which led to a summoning of Lunar Ifrit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006770_YSHTOLA<tab>What does it tell us that the spires even have such defenses?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006770_YSHTOLA<tab>What does it tell us that the spires even have such defenses?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006780_YSHTOLA<tab>Simply pulling a prisoner from the wall is fatal, thus the direct approach is doomed to failure from the outset. Any further measures to dissuade such actions seem...unnecessary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006780_YSHTOLA<tab>Simply pulling a prisoner from the wall is fatal, thus the direct approach is doomed to failure from the outset. Any further measures to dissuade such actions seem...unnecessary.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006790_YSHTOLA<tab>Unless, of course, there <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> a way to free the prisoners without killing them. Then it stands to reason that any intruders would be met with overwhelming force.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006790_YSHTOLA<tab>Unless, of course, there <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> a way to free the prisoners without killing them. Then it stands to reason that any intruders would be met with overwhelming force.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006800_URIANGER<tab>The towers appeared throughout the world in but the twinkling of an eye. 'Twas by magical means these structures were raised, I surmise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006800_URIANGER<tab>The towers appeared throughout the world in but the twinkling of an eye. 'Twas by magical means these structures were raised, I surmise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006810_URIANGER<tab>A spire thus conjured must needs be maintained, and I suspect an arcane catalyst─some manner of “core”─doth lie hidden within.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006810_URIANGER<tab>A spire thus conjured must needs be maintained, and I suspect an arcane catalyst─some manner of “core”─doth lie hidden within.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006820_URIANGER<tab>Destroy the core, and the tower ceaseth to be...thus liberating the captives without harm!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006820_URIANGER<tab>Destroy the core, and the tower ceaseth to be...thus liberating the captives without harm!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006830_YSHTOLA<tab>So we can hope. And I would prefer to enter the tower with a working theory than with no plan at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006830_YSHTOLA<tab>So we can hope. And I would prefer to enter the tower with a working theory than with no plan at all.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006840_THANCRED<tab>Assuming Y'shtola's reasoning is correct, the chances of the defenses remaining dormant are small to none.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006840_THANCRED<tab>Assuming Y'shtola's reasoning is correct, the chances of the defenses remaining dormant are small to none.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006850_THANCRED<tab>Any primals will have to be dealt with, and defeating one will likely only lead to the summoning of another. Our every victory will only compound the prisoners' suffering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006850_THANCRED<tab>Any primals will have to be dealt with, and defeating one will likely only lead to the summoning of another. Our every victory will only compound the prisoners' suffering.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006860_GRAHATIA<tab>May we not then divide our forces?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006860_GRAHATIA<tab>May we not then divide our forces?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006870_GRAHATIA<tab>Those proficient in healing will focus on sustaining the captives. That duty can be covered by Urianger, Krile, Y'shtola, and myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006870_GRAHATIA<tab>Those proficient in healing will focus on sustaining the captives. That duty can be covered by Urianger, Krile, Y'shtola, and myself.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006880_GRAHATIA<tab>The remaining Scions will proceed with the search for the core. Admittedly, this strategy puts both parties at greater risk, but it should bolster our chances of saving the Arkasodara by a considerable margin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006880_GRAHATIA<tab>The remaining Scions will proceed with the search for the core. Admittedly, this strategy puts both parties at greater risk, but it should bolster our chances of saving the Arkasodara by a considerable margin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you sure Alphinaud is in the right group?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you sure Alphinaud is in the right group?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What of Alisaie? She knows a healing spell or two.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What of Alisaie? She knows a healing spell or two.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aren't you forgetting someone!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aren't you forgetting someone!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006890_GRAHATIA<tab>If you're to fight primals, then you'd best have at least one healer with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006890_GRAHATIA<tab>If you're to fight primals, then you'd best have at least one healer with you.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006900_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I am more than happy to fulfill that role. I've found wielding a sage's armaments to be rather intuitive, and look forward to testing them against a more challenging foe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006900_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I am more than happy to fulfill that role. I've found wielding a sage's armaments to be rather intuitive, and look forward to testing them against a more challenging foe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006910_GRAHATIA<tab>That she does, but I think Alisaie herself would assert that she's at her best when she's charging unto the breach.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006910_GRAHATIA<tab>That she does, but I think Alisaie herself would assert that she's at her best when she's charging unto the breach.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006920_GRAHATIA<tab>And from what I recall from the Grand Cosmos, there's a spring in her step when she fights by your side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006920_GRAHATIA<tab>And from what I recall from the Grand Cosmos, there's a spring in her step when she fights by your side.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006930_ALISAIE<tab>Ye gods, will you never let me hear the end of that? Rest assured that I will do what is asked of me regardless of who I happen to be standing next to at any given time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006930_ALISAIE<tab>Ye gods, will you never let me hear the end of that? Rest assured that I will do what is asked of me regardless of who I happen to be standing next to at any given time!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006940_GRAHATIA<tab>Of course not! As our most talented healer, we need you leading the van, fighting primals on the front lines.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006940_GRAHATIA<tab>Of course not! As our most talented healer, we need you leading the van, fighting primals on the front lines.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006950_KRILE<tab>It seems we have a plan; all that remains is to carry it out. I will inform Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han of our movements, so let us make our preparations and regroup near the tower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006950_KRILE<tab>It seems we have a plan; all that remains is to carry it out. I will inform Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han of our movements, so let us make our preparations and regroup near the tower.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006960_THANCRED<tab>The military post in what's left of the Hamsa Hatchery should serve as a convenient staging point.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006960_THANCRED<tab>The military post in what's left of the Hamsa Hatchery should serve as a convenient staging point.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006970_KRILE<tab>That sounds perfect! And remember: the experimental aetheryte at the Confluence is there for those who need it, so there's no excuse for being late!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006970_KRILE<tab>That sounds perfect! And remember: the experimental aetheryte at the Confluence is there for those who need it, so there's no excuse for being late!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006980_KRILE<tab>Is everyone all right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006980_KRILE<tab>Is everyone all right!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006990_GRAHATIA<tab>We fortified the captives with what magicks we could. Have the defenses been disabled? All appears quiet for the moment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_006990_GRAHATIA<tab>We fortified the captives with what magicks we could. Have the defenses been disabled? All appears quiet for the moment...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007000_KRILE<tab>The lower floors were disturbing enough, but this place feels...wrong. The aether is heavy and thick. Like wading through a quagmire...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007000_KRILE<tab>The lower floors were disturbing enough, but this place feels...wrong. The aether is heavy and thick. Like wading through a quagmire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007010_URIANGER<tab>I believe we stand in the tower's beating heart. What sayest thou, Y'shtola...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007010_URIANGER<tab>I believe we stand in the tower's beating heart. What sayest thou, Y'shtola...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007020_YSHTOLA<tab>I see it. Aether siphoned from the land runs up through the spire, flowing to a single point...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007020_YSHTOLA<tab>I see it. Aether siphoned from the land runs up through the spire, flowing to a single point...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007030_YSHTOLA<tab>This is the core we seek.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007030_YSHTOLA<tab>This is the core we seek.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007040_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet something is...off. As large as this structure is, it siphons far more aether than is required to sustain it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007040_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet something is...off. As large as this structure is, it siphons far more aether than is required to sustain it.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007050_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis as if the core is feeding on the energy. Consuming it. I need to take a closer look...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007050_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis as if the core is feeding on the energy. Consuming it. I need to take a closer look...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007060_YSHTOLA<tab>...Curious. There is something there, embedded inside the core.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007060_YSHTOLA<tab>...Curious. There is something there, embedded inside the core.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007070_YSHTOLA<tab>A man's limb...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007070_YSHTOLA<tab>A man's limb...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007080_ESTINIEN<tab>This is what we came to destroy?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007080_ESTINIEN<tab>This is what we came to destroy?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007090_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes. If you would be so kind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007090_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes. If you would be so kind?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007100_ESTINIEN<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007100_ESTINIEN<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007110_ALPHINAUD<tab>And that should be the end of it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007110_ALPHINAUD<tab>And that should be the end of it!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007120_ALISAIE<tab>Ugh, what now!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007120_ALISAIE<tab>Ugh, what now!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007130_URIANGER<tab>My theory that the tower might come crashing down following the core's destruction doth appear to be correct.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007130_URIANGER<tab>My theory that the tower might come crashing down following the core's destruction doth appear to be correct.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007140_ALISAIE<tab>Bully for you! And how are we supposed to survive the fall!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007140_ALISAIE<tab>Bully for you! And how are we supposed to survive the fall!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007150_GRAHATIA<tab>What of the prisoners below...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007150_GRAHATIA<tab>What of the prisoners below...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007160_YSHTOLA<tab>The floor beneath our very feet dissolves. Brace yourselves!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007160_YSHTOLA<tab>The floor beneath our very feet dissolves. Brace yourselves!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007170_GRAHATIA<tab>I pray I'm not too late!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007170_GRAHATIA<tab>I pray I'm not too late!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007180_ALISAIE<tab>What happened? Where are we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007180_ALISAIE<tab>What happened? Where are we?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007190_ALPHINAUD<tab>By my reckoning, we're still on the island where the tower stood but...'tis as if it never existed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007190_ALPHINAUD<tab>By my reckoning, we're still on the island where the tower stood but...'tis as if it never existed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hardly a scratch. But how...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hardly a scratch. But how...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007210_KRILE<tab>G'raha wove a levitation spell at the last moment. Large enough to catch everyone, it would seem.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007210_KRILE<tab>G'raha wove a levitation spell at the last moment. Large enough to catch everyone, it would seem.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007220_THANCRED<tab>That explains the lack of obvious injuries.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007220_THANCRED<tab>That explains the lack of obvious injuries.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007230_KRILE<tab>The expenditure of so much aether has taken its toll. He will need plenty of rest, but should otherwise be none the worse for wear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007230_KRILE<tab>The expenditure of so much aether has taken its toll. He will need plenty of rest, but should otherwise be none the worse for wear.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007240_THANCRED<tab>Then the immediate problem is what to do with our new friends here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007240_THANCRED<tab>Then the immediate problem is what to do with our new friends here.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007250_THANCRED<tab>They'll be much changed for their time in the tower. Even if their bodies are intact, I doubt we could say the same for their minds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007250_THANCRED<tab>They'll be much changed for their time in the tower. Even if their bodies are intact, I doubt we could say the same for their minds.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007260_ALISAIE<tab>Angelo and I will take care of that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007260_ALISAIE<tab>Angelo and I will take care of that.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007270_THANCRED<tab>I have every faith in you, Alisaie, but there are just too many for you to treat alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007270_THANCRED<tab>I have every faith in you, Alisaie, but there are just too many for you to treat alone.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007280_YSHTOLA<tab>We'll send at once to Eorzea for more porxies, and call on the local mages to lend a hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007280_YSHTOLA<tab>We'll send at once to Eorzea for more porxies, and call on the local mages to lend a hand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007290_VARSHAHN<tab>Hail, Scions!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007290_VARSHAHN<tab>Hail, Scions!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007300_VARSHAHN<tab>We were watching the tower, when it simply...disappeared. What happened here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007300_VARSHAHN<tab>We were watching the tower, when it simply...disappeared. What happened here?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007310_URIANGER<tab>The threat is banished, and thy people delivered. They are, however, in need of treatment, and we of a secure locale and helping hands to assist us in its provision.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007310_URIANGER<tab>The threat is banished, and thy people delivered. They are, however, in need of treatment, and we of a secure locale and helping hands to assist us in its provision.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007320_VARSHAHN<tab>You shall have all this and more. Come, let us convey these unfortunate souls to the city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007320_VARSHAHN<tab>You shall have all this and more. Come, let us convey these unfortunate souls to the city.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007330_THANCRED<tab>...Are we the last to arrive? I hope we've not kept you waiting!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007330_THANCRED<tab>...Are we the last to arrive? I hope we've not kept you waiting!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007340_AWAHEEN<tab>Not at all. Your comrade is feeling better, I trust?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007340_AWAHEEN<tab>Not at all. Your comrade is feeling better, I trust?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007350_GRAHATIA<tab>Much better, thank you. Hannish remedies are certainly potent─in more ways than one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007350_GRAHATIA<tab>Much better, thank you. Hannish remedies are certainly potent─in more ways than one.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007360_AWAHEEN<tab>One becomes accustomed to the taste, although I hope you never have cause to do so. Pray take your ease.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007360_AWAHEEN<tab>One becomes accustomed to the taste, although I hope you never have cause to do so. Pray take your ease.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007370_GRAHATIA<tab>Full glad I am to see you all unharmed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007370_GRAHATIA<tab>Full glad I am to see you all unharmed.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007380_VRITRA<tab>Valiant Scions. For your heroism, you have my boundless gratitude.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007380_VRITRA<tab>Valiant Scions. For your heroism, you have my boundless gratitude.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007390_VRITRA<tab>You cast down that dire tower and set free its hapless captives. You cleansed their souls of its corrupting influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007390_VRITRA<tab>You cast down that dire tower and set free its hapless captives. You cleansed their souls of its corrupting influence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007400_VRITRA<tab>No words of thanks will suffice. In place of platitudes, I offer a bounty of warding scales.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007400_VRITRA<tab>No words of thanks will suffice. In place of platitudes, I offer a bounty of warding scales.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007410_VRITRA<tab>Pray accept your due reward, along with the goodwill of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007420_AWAHEEN<tab>Alchemists throughout the land were put to work in the forging of your talismans. The finished ones have been collected, and now await you at the High Crucible of Al-Kimiya.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007420_AWAHEEN<tab>Alchemists throughout the land were put to work in the forging of your talismans. The finished ones have been collected, and now await you at the High Crucible of Al-Kimiya.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007430_AWAHEEN<tab>Present this letter when you are ready to take them into your possession.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007430_AWAHEEN<tab>Present this letter when you are ready to take them into your possession.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007440_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are humbled by your generosity. Know that the inventive wisdom of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han will be vital in restoring serenity to our star.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007440_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are humbled by your generosity. Know that the inventive wisdom of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han will be vital in restoring serenity to our star.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007450_ALISAIE<tab>Every single one of those scales came from you, didn't they? You must still be in such pain...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007450_ALISAIE<tab>Every single one of those scales came from you, didn't they? You must still be in such pain...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007460_VRITRA<tab>'Tis of no moment. A mere annoyance compared to the dreadful suffering inflicted upon this land and its people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007460_VRITRA<tab>'Tis of no moment. A mere annoyance compared to the dreadful suffering inflicted upon this land and its people.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007470_ALPHINAUD<tab>Albeit brief, my involvement in the Dragonsong War afforded me a glimpse of the myriad sorrows which consumed both dragon and man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007470_ALPHINAUD<tab>Albeit brief, my involvement in the Dragonsong War afforded me a glimpse of the myriad sorrows which consumed both dragon and man.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though you were half a world away, such tragedies as befell your kin must have affected you deeply.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though you were half a world away, such tragedies as befell your kin must have affected you deeply.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007490_ALPHINAUD<tab>And yet you chose to live among men.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007490_ALPHINAUD<tab>And yet you chose to live among men.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007500_VRITRA<tab>In the age when that conflict first bloomed, my choice had already been made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007500_VRITRA<tab>In the age when that conflict first bloomed, my choice had already been made.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007510_VRITRA<tab>In some distant place, man slew dragon, and dragon slaughtered man. Yet no hate could I muster for those smiling faces which did look to me for guidance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007510_VRITRA<tab>In some distant place, man slew dragon, and dragon slaughtered man. Yet no hate could I muster for those smiling faces which did look to me for guidance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007520_VRITRA<tab>Not even my brother's righteous rage could rally me to his cause. I huddled here, secret and still, hoping against hope that which I had built would remain untouched by the chaos and carnage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007520_VRITRA<tab>Not even my brother's righteous rage could rally me to his cause. I huddled here, secret and still, hoping against hope that which I had built would remain untouched by the chaos and carnage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007530_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twould seem we share the same desire for peace, great Vrtra. To that end, I wonder if we might trouble you with another question.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007530_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twould seem we share the same desire for peace, great Vrtra. To that end, I wonder if we might trouble you with another question.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007540_YSHTOLA<tab>The Telophoroi are intent on recreating the Final Days, an apocalyptic event which we know to predate the sundering of the star.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007540_YSHTOLA<tab>The Telophoroi are intent on recreating the Final Days, an apocalyptic event which we know to predate the sundering of the star.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007550_YSHTOLA<tab>As the longest lived among us, know you aught of this terrible cataclysm?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007550_YSHTOLA<tab>As the longest lived among us, know you aught of this terrible cataclysm?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007560_VRITRA<tab>Nay. When war and strife drove my sire from his home, he crossed the great expanse with only our unhatched eggs as company.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007560_VRITRA<tab>Nay. When war and strife drove my sire from his home, he crossed the great expanse with only our unhatched eggs as company.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007570_VRITRA<tab>He alighted upon a shattered Source, its thirteen reflections long since scattered beyond the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007570_VRITRA<tab>He alighted upon a shattered Source, its thirteen reflections long since scattered beyond the rift.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007580_VRITRA<tab>Of events preceding his arrival, he knoweth naught save that which Hydaelyn hath deigned to disclose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007580_VRITRA<tab>Of events preceding his arrival, he knoweth naught save that which Hydaelyn hath deigned to disclose.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007590_YSHTOLA<tab>I see... So again, 'tis the inscrutable Hydaelyn to whom we must look for answers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007590_YSHTOLA<tab>I see... So again, 'tis the inscrutable Hydaelyn to whom we must look for answers.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007600_VRITRA<tab>Seek you to divine the will of this star? If so, I have a tale which may afford you some small comfort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007600_VRITRA<tab>Seek you to divine the will of this star? If so, I have a tale which may afford you some small comfort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007610_VRITRA<tab>'Tis a story from my youth, many, many years ago... To my sire, I once posed the question, “Of all the stars in the sky, why didst thou settle upon this one?”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007610_VRITRA<tab>'Tis a story from my youth, many, many years ago... To my sire, I once posed the question, “Of all the stars in the sky, why didst thou settle upon this one?”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007620_VRITRA<tab>To which Midgardsormr did reply, “'Twas the last bastion of hope.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007620_VRITRA<tab>To which Midgardsormr did reply, “'Twas the last bastion of hope.”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007630_VRITRA<tab>He believed, so long as Hydaelyn endured, so too might dragonkind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007630_VRITRA<tab>He believed, so long as Hydaelyn endured, so too might dragonkind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007640_VRITRA<tab>Solemn and portentous were his words. What deeper meaning they held, I could not─dared not─pursue. 'Tis a stone I've left unturned ever since.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007640_VRITRA<tab>Solemn and portentous were his words. What deeper meaning they held, I could not─dared not─pursue. 'Tis a stone I've left unturned ever since.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007650_VRITRA<tab>Yet take you solace in the knowledge that, whatsoever Hydaelyn doth strive towards, 'tis an ideal which hath earned my sire's conviction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007650_VRITRA<tab>Yet take you solace in the knowledge that, whatsoever Hydaelyn doth strive towards, 'tis an ideal which hath earned my sire's conviction.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007660_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank you, Vrtra. You've given us warm reassurance in a world gripped by cold uncertainty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007660_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank you, Vrtra. You've given us warm reassurance in a world gripped by cold uncertainty.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007670_THANCRED<tab>While I'm sure we all have a great many questions, I think it's time we collect the talismans and be on our way. Our fight against the Telophoroi is far from finished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007670_THANCRED<tab>While I'm sure we all have a great many questions, I think it's time we collect the talismans and be on our way. Our fight against the Telophoroi is far from finished.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007680_KRILE<tab>We must take our leave, but please do inform us if we can provide any further assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007680_KRILE<tab>We must take our leave, but please do inform us if we can provide any further assistance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007690_VRITRA<tab>Prithee, a moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007690_VRITRA<tab>Prithee, a moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007700_VRITRA<tab>There is one whom my sire hath judged worthy of honor and respect─the one known to men as Eorzea's champion. This hero of renown and rumor...'tis thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007700_VRITRA<tab>There is one whom my sire hath judged worthy of honor and respect─the one known to men as Eorzea's champion. This hero of renown and rumor...'tis thee.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Midgardsormr and I have crossed paths, yes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Midgardsormr and I have crossed paths, yes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've not spoken with your father in some time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've not spoken with your father in some time...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I only wish he could be here with us now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_A10_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I only wish he could be here with us now...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007710_VRITRA<tab>I knew it to be so. From man and dragon alike have I learned of thine exploits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007710_VRITRA<tab>I knew it to be so. From man and dragon alike have I learned of thine exploits.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007720_VRITRA<tab>In accordance with the covenant he forged with Hydaelyn, the stewardship of this star hath ever been his purpose. Silence in the face of thine actions is the greatest sign of his approval.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007720_VRITRA<tab>In accordance with the covenant he forged with Hydaelyn, the stewardship of this star hath ever been his purpose. Silence in the face of thine actions is the greatest sign of his approval.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007730_VRITRA<tab>I know of his clash with Omega, and the long slumber which was his price.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007730_VRITRA<tab>I know of his clash with Omega, and the long slumber which was his price.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007740_VRITRA<tab>Yet even closed in sleep, my father's eyes are far from blind. He is watching over thee; watching over this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007740_VRITRA<tab>Yet even closed in sleep, my father's eyes are far from blind. He is watching over thee; watching over this world.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007750_VRITRA<tab>'Twas a revelation most pleasing that thou─a child of man─had gained Midgardsormr's trust. But alongside mine elation runneth a rivulet of dread.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007750_VRITRA<tab>'Twas a revelation most pleasing that thou─a child of man─had gained Midgardsormr's trust. But alongside mine elation runneth a rivulet of dread.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007760_VRITRA<tab>For upon thy life's reel wind too many threads. Of fate. Power. Weal, enmeshed with woe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007760_VRITRA<tab>For upon thy life's reel wind too many threads. Of fate. Power. Weal, enmeshed with woe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007770_VRITRA<tab>Amidst this tangled knot, thou shalt know no rest. 'Tis an endless confluence of forces; a struggle without surcease.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007770_VRITRA<tab>Amidst this tangled knot, thou shalt know no rest. 'Tis an endless confluence of forces; a struggle without surcease.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007780_VRITRA<tab>More terrible still is the attrition wrought upon thy companions, as they are swept up in the storm of thine existence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007780_VRITRA<tab>More terrible still is the attrition wrought upon thy companions, as they are swept up in the storm of thine existence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007790_VRITRA<tab>Take heart and protect them well. They will be your strength and your salvation. The hope thou wilt need come the end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007790_VRITRA<tab>Take heart and protect them well. They will be your strength and your salvation. The hope thou wilt need come the end.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007800_VRITRA<tab>Even cowering behind my curtain, I know the suffering of the powerful. I have watched my siblings driven mad by loss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007800_VRITRA<tab>Even cowering behind my curtain, I know the suffering of the powerful. I have watched my siblings driven mad by loss.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007810_VRITRA<tab>Thus do I exhort thee to spare no effort to keep thy loved ones safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007810_VRITRA<tab>Thus do I exhort thee to spare no effort to keep thy loved ones safe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, apologies. We hadn't meant to interrupt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, apologies. We hadn't meant to interrupt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007830_ALISAIE<tab>It's just that we <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> have a history of suddenly collapsing, and when you didn't follow us out...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007830_ALISAIE<tab>It's just that we <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> have a history of suddenly collapsing, and when you didn't follow us out...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007840_VRITRA<tab>'Tis I who must apologize. I have detained your champion overlong with idle chatter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007840_VRITRA<tab>'Tis I who must apologize. I have detained your champion overlong with idle chatter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007850_VRITRA<tab>Go. At war's end, I pray I welcome thee back into my hall, where together with thy joyful comrades you may toast your triumph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007850_VRITRA<tab>Go. At war's end, I pray I welcome thee back into my hall, where together with thy joyful comrades you may toast your triumph.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007860_ALISAIE<tab>These are the talismans we were promised?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007860_ALISAIE<tab>These are the talismans we were promised?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007870_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes, and I made a quick count: there are far more than we could have hoped for.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007870_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes, and I made a quick count: there are far more than we could have hoped for.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007880_YSHTOLA<tab>Enough to outfit an entire company of soldiers, in fact. Considering the involved process, that they were able to manufacture so many in such a short span of time is nothing short of a miracle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007880_YSHTOLA<tab>Enough to outfit an entire company of soldiers, in fact. Considering the involved process, that they were able to manufacture so many in such a short span of time is nothing short of a miracle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once we have distributed them to our allies in Eorzea and the Far East, we'll have a fighting chance to bring down the other spires─just as we did with the Tower of Zot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once we have distributed them to our allies in Eorzea and the Far East, we'll have a fighting chance to bring down the other spires─just as we did with the Tower of Zot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007900_YSHTOLA<tab>Or, we could use them to invade Garlemald proper, and strike directly at the Telophoroi's base of operations...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007900_YSHTOLA<tab>Or, we could use them to invade Garlemald proper, and strike directly at the Telophoroi's base of operations...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007910_YSHTOLA<tab>Of course, we would need to consult with various Alliance leaders before such a drastic measure could even be contemplated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007910_YSHTOLA<tab>Of course, we would need to consult with various Alliance leaders before such a drastic measure could even be contemplated.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007920_YSHTOLA<tab>To which end I could set out forthwith and present the idea to each of our allies in person.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007920_YSHTOLA<tab>To which end I could set out forthwith and present the idea to each of our allies in person.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007930_URIANGER<tab>Pray allow me to undertake some few of those journeys. I find myself restless, and in need of purposeful duties.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007930_URIANGER<tab>Pray allow me to undertake some few of those journeys. I find myself restless, and in need of purposeful duties.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007940_THANCRED<tab>I can head eastward. Bozja and Dalmasca are just a short hop from here, and Doma's shinobi network should come in handy for passing on the word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007940_THANCRED<tab>I can head eastward. Bozja and Dalmasca are just a short hop from here, and Doma's shinobi network should come in handy for passing on the word.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007950_YSHTOLA<tab>We shall share the burden, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007950_YSHTOLA<tab>We shall share the burden, then.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007960_YSHTOLA<tab>Meanwhile, I think it best that you and the others take the talismans back to the Baldesion Annex. We must keep them safe and secure until we've decided upon a course of action.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007960_YSHTOLA<tab>Meanwhile, I think it best that you and the others take the talismans back to the Baldesion Annex. We must keep them safe and secure until we've decided upon a course of action.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007970_NIDHANA<tab>Please, I must speak with you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007970_NIDHANA<tab>Please, I must speak with you!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007980_THANCRED<tab>Nidhana!? You're awake!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007980_THANCRED<tab>Nidhana!? You're awake!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007990_NIDHANA<tab>Yes. When I spoke with the carer at my bedside, she told me that one of the Scions─a young woman─had cleansed me of the tower's corruption.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_007990_NIDHANA<tab>Yes. When I spoke with the carer at my bedside, she told me that one of the Scions─a young woman─had cleansed me of the tower's corruption.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008000_NIDHANA<tab>It seems I've been asleep ever since the treatment... But when I awoke and learned you were all still here, I knew I had to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008000_NIDHANA<tab>It seems I've been asleep ever since the treatment... But when I awoke and learned you were all still here, I knew I had to come.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008010_ALISAIE<tab>As you said, Nidhana was captured only recently.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008010_ALISAIE<tab>As you said, Nidhana was captured only recently.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008020_ALISAIE<tab>Such a brief exposure is swiftly cured, so I tended to her before we gathered at Meghaduta.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008020_ALISAIE<tab>Such a brief exposure is swiftly cured, so I tended to her before we gathered at Meghaduta.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008030_NIDHANA<tab>And I am truly grateful that you did! I cannot thank you enough...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008030_NIDHANA<tab>And I am truly grateful that you did! I cannot thank you enough...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008040_NIDHANA<tab>All of you─for everything you've done. Destroying the tower, rescuing our people...you've saved Thavnair from an awful fate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008040_NIDHANA<tab>All of you─for everything you've done. Destroying the tower, rescuing our people...you've saved Thavnair from an awful fate!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008050_URIANGER<tab>Yet who hath truly saved whom?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008050_URIANGER<tab>Yet who hath truly saved whom?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008060_URIANGER<tab>Due in no small part to thine inspirational courage, the alchemists were successful in reproducing warding scales of proven efficacy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008060_URIANGER<tab>Due in no small part to thine inspirational courage, the alchemists were successful in reproducing warding scales of proven efficacy.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008070_URIANGER<tab>Replications of thy work now stand ready to travel across the seas, unto the hands of those who might wield them against this rising evil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008070_URIANGER<tab>Replications of thy work now stand ready to travel across the seas, unto the hands of those who might wield them against this rising evil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008080_NIDHANA<tab>The talisman? Is this true!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008080_NIDHANA<tab>The talisman? Is this true!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008090_NIDHANA<tab>I was so groggy from sleep, I didn't even think to ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008090_NIDHANA<tab>I was so groggy from sleep, I didn't even think to ask.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008100_NIDHANA<tab>Our great work, sent across the seas...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008100_NIDHANA<tab>Our great work, sent across the seas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008110_NIDHANA<tab>It was worth it. It was all worth it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008110_NIDHANA<tab>It was worth it. It was all worth it!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008120_KRILE<tab>Look at that! Its color is completely changed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008120_KRILE<tab>Look at that! Its color is completely changed!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008130_NIDHANA<tab>What do you have there...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008130_NIDHANA<tab>What do you have there...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008140_NIDHANA<tab>How unusual. I wonder if the effect is a reaction to akasa.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008140_NIDHANA<tab>How unusual. I wonder if the effect is a reaction to akasa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008150_KRILE<tab>I'm afraid I'm not familiar with that term.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008150_KRILE<tab>I'm afraid I'm not familiar with that term.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008160_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa? It is one of the unseen energies defined by Hannish alchemical theory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008160_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa? It is one of the unseen energies defined by Hannish alchemical theory.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008170_NIDHANA<tab>Though a gross oversimplification, some describe it as an essence influenced by feelings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008170_NIDHANA<tab>Though a gross oversimplification, some describe it as an essence influenced by feelings.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008180_ALPHINAUD<tab>You imply that it is distinct from aether?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008180_ALPHINAUD<tab>You imply that it is distinct from aether?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008190_NIDHANA<tab>Foreign scholars often conflate the two, but we see them as separate concepts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008190_NIDHANA<tab>Foreign scholars often conflate the two, but we see them as separate concepts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008200_NIDHANA<tab>Aether is an energy which permeates the land. It exists within animals, objects, even the air we breathe, affecting all through which it flows.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008200_NIDHANA<tab>Aether is an energy which permeates the land. It exists within animals, objects, even the air we breathe, affecting all through which it flows.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008210_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa, on the other hand, exists in a domain beyond our reach. A gift bestowed from on high─or torn from the heavens, in some traditions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008210_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa, on the other hand, exists in a domain beyond our reach. A gift bestowed from on high─or torn from the heavens, in some traditions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008220_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa can neither be created, nor destroyed. It is beyond our power to purposefully alter or manipulate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008220_NIDHANA<tab>Akasa can neither be created, nor destroyed. It is beyond our power to purposefully alter or manipulate.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008230_NIDHANA<tab>The only thing observed to influence it is an abundance of...I want to say “spiritual emotion.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008230_NIDHANA<tab>The only thing observed to influence it is an abundance of...I want to say “spiritual emotion.”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008240_NIDHANA<tab>As a veteran of the battlefield, surely you've experienced moments of desperation or exaltation when you've transcended the usual limits of your capabilities?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008240_NIDHANA<tab>As a veteran of the battlefield, surely you've experienced moments of desperation or exaltation when you've transcended the usual limits of your capabilities?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008250_NIDHANA<tab>That is a manifestation of akasa, the invisible essence harnessed by heart, mind, and unyielding spirit!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06000_008250_NIDHANA<tab>That is a manifestation of akasa, the invisible essence harnessed by heart, mind, and unyielding spirit!
